Her heartbeat was so high that you almost had to drink to calm her down from a possible heart attack. However in this close position it very closely resembled what she had last seen in her dream but you had your had over her mouth and sank your fangs into her tender neck and very shortly silenced her as she fell unconscious in a faint, not the result of you drinking too much. To be fair you only drank a little and enough so you didn’t have to visit anyone else that night. However the last part of your plan came about as Eve heard your voice and barged in to the room. You left a little blood on her neck but dashed out the open and exposed window. Everyone around was up and moving about at this point and you smiled as Josi woke and clung to a shocked Eve, saying how sorry she was and what not. With that done and a full belly of blood you went to get a little rest yourself.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Hunting the dreamers.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
The two months of training was very structured to the point where there wasn’t a lot of variety, other than learning to deal with new things with new abilities. You all learned so much, for starters you could harden you skin rather than turn it to mist in order to fend off bullets. You could use your mist to filter and drink blood that was on the ground for a variety of reasons; food, tracking, information,… More importantly you increased your power by almost 4 times, including how much blood you needed to power your abilities when used. You made a lot of progress in your Vampire mindset as well. You now had no hesitation to drink from anyone but an insane amount of control to drink just a little from anyone or no one. However the others also improved. Eve grew to a little larger than a large dog but gained, along with you, a lot of battle and hunting experience. She also became a more than valued member of the family with no one shunning her anymore, while they deeply respected what you could do but didn’t fear you for it. A better way to put it was that they were glad that you were on their side at the end of it.

During the summer it had been accepted that the woods were an extremely dangerous place. You could now us a more dispersed mist without strain like Eve uses her webs. You couldn’t control anything with the stuff but you could cover all 500 acres of the land with the fog like mist as a sort of surveillance and illusion based ability. No one that was in their right mind went into the woods, especially at night while you were out there. Only at dawn or dusk was it safe to approach as you came out for day training or event instructions. They all knew about your dream entering ability as you used it sometimes to help them think on mistakes, other times to seduce them into going into the woods for a free meal, while other times scaring the crap out them if they needed the kick in the butt.

By the end they all finally got it and were light sleepers and highly trained in hunting and/or fighting you. Their teamwork had improved and even Isaac and Dana had been able to score a few hits on you, although with them you let them get more shots in then the others, if for no other reason than to show you still were watching out for them and making sure they felt part of the group. When you were caught you were tortured to the point where a few times you wondered if they loved you or not. But at dawn or dusk they released you and the thought was just an afterthought. But now you all met with your bags packed and ready to leave. Those that drove had their cars packed and the Cabin locked down. Some had to be back by the beginning of August so that was when this fun little vacation ended.

“So what did you all think?” asked Grandpa Lon as you all gathered.

“It was hard but worth it. As much as it stunk at times I can’t wait to do it again.” You answered as people crowded around each other. Even if you were dangerous they had all been fed on at this point and knew that, while you could make it a horrible experience, it was more enjoyable then dreadful. You and Eve were now the most popular people in the family.

“Likewise, I’m going to be thinking all year how to get Caleb next year… are we doing this next year?” Eve asked as she thought it might be a onetime thing, but hoped not.

“I think it was a good bonding experience. It would be well worth the effort to come back every year for this. We have all year to study and try to think of ways to kill you.” Uncle Rusty said as he smiled at you, as did many others with similar ideas.

“Plus by next year, Eve will be like huge and can really make Caleb work for it.” Aunt Penny stated.

“Although… going back to normal living will be a pain.” Jordan said, she being one of Uncle Jim’s daughters around your age. Everyone looked at her as if to ask what she meant. “Well after keeping one eye open all the time, even when sleeping, for Caleb to come around. If nothing else I’m going to be double checking shadows by habit alone.”

“True, the transition will be hard. Going from fending off a Vampire to homework, sports, and video games.” Jacob, Jordan’s brother, agreed with the rest of them.

“I could always come around randomly if you want.” You offered with a grin.

“Thanks for the offer but I think 10 months of peace and quiet will do me just fine.” Uncle Matt said to the other’s laughter.

They all knew that while you weren’t restricted like you use to, you still couldn’t hunt like you did for the last 2 months. If someone let you drink from them that was one thing but you couldn’t force your way once you were suppose to be living as a human. Although… they did say they would be calling you if they got stuck in a ditch or got kidnapped. To be honest, who really cared about people kidnapping them when they could call you to save them? Although, in the back of their mind, they would keep an eye out for other ‘freaks’ in their life that wouldn’t be as respectful, gentle, kind, and… human as you.

“Ok, who’s first?” you asked as you were about to teleport each family back to their homes, even the ones that lived far away like Uncle Rusty and his family to California and so on. They all got in line with the grandparents at the back and your family last. No one was shunning anyone anymore, including you and Eve. Your abnormal abilities had become so expected that it was no longer shocking when you did something they hadn’t seen you do before. All in all this was a great summer and you looked forward to next year, even if it would be harder.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Going home after the vacation.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
The last month of Summer break was used as an actual BREAK. Eve had requested at least a week where she and you could hang out for her and your R&R. She had suspected but you told her about the times you entered people’s dreams and scared the fear of her out of them. She still had been wondering how Josi in particular had changed from such hate and loathing toward her to deep love and admiration in the span of a few hours. She thanked you deeply for it then you both just hung out for a very long time doing nothing in particular, just sitting with each other and letting her cocoon you at night once more. After trying to kill each other all summer it was nice just to relax. Others came over more often as well and Eve was afforded the luxury of being unrestrained around the house, well minus only making large webs in your room. Mom still had to keep the house clean but she didn’t mind a few to catch some pesky mice or whatever. Weird thing was though that you hadn’t seen Kelsey all summer. You had told her that you would be gone for most of it but when you went to her usual hang outs you couldn’t find her. So you just waited for school to start. It was hard to take school seriously when you had done so much over the summer. But you really didn’t notice how much physically you changed until you walked in the front doors and was greeted by a girl you almost didn’t recognize.

“Caleb!” blared Kelsey’s voice from the young girl the threw herself on you, hugging around your neck and swinging before coming to a stop. “Wow, you’re so big.” She said and it was then you noticed yourself. You were now about 5’5’’, and for a 7th grade student it wasn’t small at all. That and your body mass almost doubled. You were still lean but, unlike last year, you didn’t start out as a scrawny kid with a new gift. You had trained all summer and it showed on your new body. But then you looked at her, she was way different and was turning every head in the place.

“I guess so, but look at you… I guess what my Mom said was right huh?” you complimented as she blushed while you two parted. “Do you mind if I take a look?” you asked. Usually guys just check out girls wither they got permission or not, and especially if they were too shy to do anything but look. However you had told her that when she finally did ‘bloom’ that you wouldn’t until you asked her.

So she nodded and backed up a little then did a little but slow turn so you could take her all in. Her now slightly longer wavy but still silky black hair draped over her shoulders a little and almost made it to the top of her well form breasts. For them, if you couldn’t see deeper, it looked like they were fake due not only by their sudden size but desired shape from those that went in for that kind of thing. But no they were real and they balanced nicely with her butt, both were big but not so much to attract only people that like large butts and breasts. She still had a highly athletic but slim figure and nothing was to out of proportion. Lastly her eyes shined a radiant blue that were more catching than before. This part hit you the most as her height and other small details were registered but usually eyes didn’t change unless… Yes, now that you were thinking about it you could smell that her scent had changed slightly as well. She still smelled like Kelsey but now had the tint of something else that wasn’t there before. She was definitely hiding something like you were but since she never hassled you about revealing anything you just let it slide for now.

“So… what do you think?” she asked in a shy but cute posture. Again you were slightly clueless when it came to girls flirting with you and apparently the ignorant flaw of yours was one of the things she liked.

“I think both of us will be having a harder time this year keeping our promise.” You answered, referring to the promise of being good friends no matter how popular each other get. She smiled and hugged into you but you both were shoved out of the way by the Vampire Clan, or the school’s faction of it. This new trend had actually become a slight problem as it had spread to other schools, even across the country and the ones that graduated started gangs. Figured that their headquarters for this gang was in Milwaukee where you lived. You were just glad that they resided downtown while you were in one of the counties just outside of it. Your family were slightly put off by this as were you, understandably so. It had been a new topic recently that kids that graduated while in those clans went straight to the Vampire Clan gang and fanged murders had been popping up more recently. This made each clan become more feared in the school they were in. Even teachers sometimes catered to their wishes.

“What a bunch of creeps.” Kelsey said once they were out of earshot. Not that she was afraid of them with you nearby but, even if she didn’t know you were a real Vampire, but she didn’t want to cause any trouble and neither did you.

“No question there. Hey, you know they are probably going to like you to right?” you asked as you both started off toward class. With 7th grade came the full implementation of separate teachers for each class. You two tried hard to get each class with the other and got a high majority of them.

“So being popular will have an ugly side.” she sighed.

“Well our parents always said, ‘the grass is always greener on the other side’.” You quoted like a teacher that got her to giggle and laugh a little.

“That reminds me, it’s still cool that I come over after school right?” she asked.

“Definitely, Mom and Papa would like to see you not to mention Eve.” You answered which shot a light bulb of sorts on in her head.

“Oh that’s right, your pet spider. How big is she now?” she asked.

“Well you’ll see her later but she is near this tall when standing.” You said as you lowered your hand only a little to show her.

“That big!?” she exclaimed. “She has to be the world’s biggest spider, either that or there is a whole army of them somewhere.”

“I don’t know too much about that but she is just as friendly as before. The family even likes here enough now to let her around the house instead of just my room. Scared the crap out of the pizza guy though.” You joked and she laughed at the thought of a scrawny pizza boy being greeted by a 3 foot tall spider like Eve.

“I can’t wait to see her then.” She said.

“Well she’s always like you so she’ll be excited as well. Hope you don’t mind her swarming you when you walk in, it has been all summer you know.” You said which made both of you laugh at the prospect as you started your day in class.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: new year, new problems.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
You were right, the Vampire Clan was becoming bolder and with Kelsey’s sudden attractive body they more than once demanded she come to them. More accurately they wanted her body more than anything, which disgusted her with more fire in her new eyes than you had seen before. Luckily you were there most of the time to talk them down, being that you were bigger than most of them and even when they ganged up on you and you didn’t use any powers they were still no match for you. Not that many of them tried. They were just humans, no matter the efforts to become something else, and knew that you impressive physic was more than just for show. However you weren’t always there and this was one of those times.

“We are tired of waiting little morsel. Come with us now.” Said a boy that was in high school and had been gawking at her for a while now. He was too weak among his own ‘clan’ to challenge them but he was more than big enough to take on any middle school kid, well except you or Matt from last year.

“You know what? I’ve had it with all you Vampires.” As you walked toward them the phrase hit you a little but knew she didn’t mean it to you and definitely not if she knew but it still hurt coming from her. “Touch me again and I’ll wipe the floor with you.” she threatened. It was impossible to know if she was bluffing without reading her mind, which you had restrain yourself not to do. Unlike Up North, you couldn’t just use your powers around here and that included mind reading.

“Kelsey, are you ok?” you asked but she did something that surprised what you thought she could and would do. She must’ve been in a sever fight mode but when you put your hand on her shoulder she turned and struck you with a blow that sent you into the wall a foot behind you. You immediately could tell she was holding back on reflex alone but the punch was still strong enough to cause a few cracks in the wall as you bounced off it and hit the ground.

You were no stranger to high impact shot from the traps Eve made Up North that actually hit. One time she had made a spiked set of trees slam together with you in the middle, that one hurt a lot. This shot she gave you wasn’t much on your list but for a human it would be enough to break at least a few bones. Luckily enough the Vampire wannabe picked a dark alley of the school, typical, to ambush her so no one but you and him saw this in different ways. He ran as he saw that he could be next as Kelsey was suddenly shocked out of whatever fight mode she was in by what she did. You didn’t think you needed the hardened skin you developed that summer so you had left yourself vulnerable and as such she effectively knocked you out. You kept your body so weak so that when the Vampire Clan issued a surprise attack they could get you on occasion. Having a metal pole hit you and it break instead of you would only bring more eyes to you. Even in this state you were stronger than a normal human but not stronger, apparently, than whatever she was.

“Caleb! No, I’m sorry. Caleb!” she yelled as you faded. This wasn’t the first time you passed out or got knocked out so you just waited. Unlike humans, you didn’t fall into a sleep of sorts when passed out for whatever reason. In fact, the one thing you wished you had that you lost with this whole Vampire thing was the ability to dream. You thought at first that it was just because of how short of rest you needed that a dream just couldn’t take its time to form but the few instances you were unconscious threw that out the window as you were out each time for about 6 hours or so. This time was no different, you could hear and partially sense what was going on around you but your sight was obviously gone with your eyes closed as was you interactivity to the outside world until you awoke.

You heard yelling and then felt movement. You couldn’t tell how fast you were going but it was faster than any person could carry you so you assumed it was a car or something. Light and dark hit your eyelids as you waited for your brain to heal and allow you to wake. Then you felt warmth and not just a warm room or basking in the sun warm. It was more like inside your body, accelerating your healing and what not. You began to hear voices more concrete than before and knew immediately that they weren’t your parents or anyone you knew, well accept one; Kelsey.

“We’ll find out in a minute, he’s coming around.” A old male voice said as you regained consciousness and opened your eyes to see Kelsey and what you assumed to be her family. But you recognized them as her family because they looked like her as in what they were. You had a feeling they were different and now you knew for sure as you looked at them. Their form being…

(Author’s note)

For the sake of suspense and additional options I will present the reader/writer with 2 choices without any designation on what they are. I only ask that if you write for a different choice of you preference that you leave room for a different preference if someone wants something else.

There is very few rules as to what she can be and as this is a fiction story I don’t care if you make Kelsey and her family all, part, or not all whatever she is. Like my version of a vampire, you can even change the basis on which your desired ‘freak/monster’ type is portrayed. Please keep this in mind as you read. Just because someone is writing a type of monster different than a traditional set means only one thing, that they are writing and expanding a FICTIONAL story. We KNOW that it isn’t what normal ones do or are capable of doing so don’t mess with them or me about it if you didn’t write some yourself…

Lastly the creature type has 2 rules that it must abide by. 1) it can’t be a Vampire. 2) The main character is or can be more powerful than whatever you choose. Perhaps not now as a 13 year old Vampire but the Monster/freak type mustn’t be something that is ALWAYS higher than the main character.

Ok, end of author’s note.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Problems with Kelsey's unkown side.

choices: Escape and attempt to wipe their memories.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
As your eyes opened you looked around the room. You were in a bed similar to the ones in a hospital with the back raised slightly so you could partially sit up without a strain. Next you were in a room that was anything but a hospital room. It had thick bars on the windows and even thicker ones bracing an obviously thick metal door that sealed the room. It was like being in a dungeon with a slightly comfortable but firm hospital bed. You glanced at the people in the room to find only a few of them were human. There was an old man with a cane next to Kelsey, who was directly to the left of you. At the foot of your bed was a butler looking human with a dazed but concentrated look in his eye, similar to when you control someone’s mind and have them do something for you. Lastly to your right was a woman that was like a mirror image of Kelsey but older.

The biggest thing that separated the two of them from the other two, other than being female, was the parts growing from them. Both of their eyes were now not glowing but more radiant than traditional human eyes they usually had out. From their backs they had a set of black furry wings that were like a velvet covered version of bat or dragon wings. The Tail from their backsides whipped around and was the same color and equally as velvet looking as their wings with a spade end to it that looked sharp enough to cut brick. You could tell that their red nails could come out and be like very long and sharp claws, similar to yours but maybe a foot longer at full length. Finally it looked like all their female features were enhanced but not overly so; for instance their hair was always good looking but now it looked like angel hair… if an angel had black flowing hair. So it wasn’t a huge difference but more than enough to enhance the allure of their bodies to any man that would look at them.

“Caleb, you’re awake.” Kelsey said as you looked at her.

“Uh… yeah, well I think I am. Assuming this isn’t some kind of dream.” You said as you took another look around.

“Silence human!” said the woman to your right as she grew a single nail and held it to the underside of your chin. One move and she could skewer your head from bottom to top. “How dare you speak to a Succubus so casually!”

“Mom, no! Please just let him recover.” Kelsey pleaded. You put on a slightly scared face just to make Kelsey’s mother feel like she was making her point. Besides, you had just found out what she was; a Succubus. Your family was right, there really was other ‘freaks’ like you out there. Although you could tell these two weren’t even an eighth to your level you were still just a human to them. You preferred it that way. Sure you would love to reveal to Kelsey what you are but this little situation had you currently in a mode of caution.

“Kelsey, your powers have awoken and you still don’t understand their place. You brought him here after you couldn’t control yourself at school. But I do admit, even I understand why. He is a wonderful example of man meat for such a young boy.” She said as she traced her nail down your throat and slightly dug into your chest as she raked it down your body and stopping just above the navel. Then she brought her nail to her mouth and licked the blood off with a talented and longer tongue than you would guess she had from her slightly slender face and mouth. “Not very tasty though.”

“Mom!” Kelsey stated as she placed her hand on your bleeding and quivering chest. A light came from your new wound to which it healed almost immediately.

“Now, now my two girls. Debora, you fell for me remember so shouldn’t she be afforded a human to play with?” Asked the old man beside Kelsey. “Kelsey, I hope you understand what you’ve done. Now that he has seen you and your mother, he can’t just leave. You know this and you still brought him here. If he must die than it is only your hands.” He said to her and she bowed her head in part shame. Then the Man turned to you with an intense gaze. “As for you young man. I hope you understand what hot water you’re in. There is a solemn rule about their kind. A Succubus can have as many slaves as they wish but only one mate. That mate must be human and they are only allowed one child per 100 years and since they can only live to be 200 they tend to only have one child. If an outsider such as yourself sees them like they are now, in their true forms, then that human must be silenced one way or another. Normally they are killed and disposed of but Kelsey brought you here. So you are quite literally on the edge of death.”

“Fine, you’re right my darling.” Kelsey’s mother said as she gazed lovingly at him over the bed. “But he stays here until you decide Kelsey. You either kill him, mate him, or seduce him; or I will.”

“Y-yes mother.” Kelsey said, still bowing in guilt and shame for her actions.

“Charles, the door.” She commanded as the butler looking human, that must’ve been one of the ‘seduced’ she just spoke of, heaved open the door for her as she helped the old man out then closed the door with Kelsey still inside with you.

“So I finally meet your parents, strange but the look loving enough in their own special way.” You stated in a carefree tone to try and get Kelsey to smile in which you failed horribly.

“How can you be this calm? I just… any way we do this your life is over. I did this to you.” she whimpered as tears began falling from her face.

“The way I see it is this. Either I am in a really involved dream or you just made a mistake. We all make mistakes and you being a… Succubus?” you asked to see if you were getting it right to which she nodded slightly as she looked at you to continue. “Well, being a Succubus must mean that your mistakes are just bigger than most. I’m not going to hate you for it. Me waking up at all means something right?”

“You don’t get it. I’m too young to seduce you or mate with you. I just got my powers so I could just as easily kill you while trying. That means I only have one option left.” She said as she grew some nails and looked at them but then shook her head and retracted them. “But I just can’t kill you. We’re friends and you are the first to be my friend. Oh why did you have to interrupt my fight?” she whined as the weight of her impending decisions came down to her.

“Hey, I just touched your shoulder in an attempt to see how you were doing. I didn’t know you were strong enough without my help. I mean sure you have always been strong at school but I obviously didn’t know you could crush me into a wall.” you defended.

“Well you should’ve known! Here’s proof!” she yelled back and dug her nails into your leg, impaling it but not hitting anything that would matter as far as bleeding out. She was obviously too emotional right now to think straight. “I hate you! Just stay here and die!” she screamed as she ran toward the door crying, opened it, slammed it shut to which you heard some bolts and what not lock the door into place. You could see the trail of blood and what was dripping from your leg. You quickly sealed it off with a strip of bandage that was lying next to the bed. You didn’t think exposing yourself would be good right now even with her saying and doing such things. She was just upset and in the middle of a Succubus puberty, which might be a little more complicated than a normal girls which you far from began to understand. So all you did was stop the bleeding and wrap it up.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Option 1

choices: They can't and you must die.
They can and they will let you go, with a good beating.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
You thought about possibly trying to wipe their minds and escaping but in the end you might miss one since you didn’t know everyone who saw you brought there, at school or otherwise. So the only option for a favorable outcome was to stay for a while. But you needed to let your parents know so you reached out with your mind and found them at home.

“Hello?” you said as if asking if they could hear you.

“Caleb, where are you? You didn’t come home from school yet and we were getting worried.” Mom said.

“Well something happened at school.” You said and felt their minds start to worry. “Nothing bad on my end but you all were right about there being more than just me as a ‘freak’ out there. I was stopping a fight when this girl knocked me out. You know how I make myself weak for appearances.”

“So it’s like that. Are you ok?” Papa asked.

“More or less. They don’t know about me being a Vampire but I might have to tell them to avoid killing them. The girl panicked when she hit me instead of the bully picking on her and brought me to her house. However she has a mother as the same thing she is and a very strict rule on what happens to keep their secret safe.” You explained.

“What kind of ‘freak’ is she?” Papa asked.

“You can’t spread this as I don’t want whatever they decide to do effecting you but she and her mother are both a Succubus. That means she has a human father and, from what I’ve seen, seduced servants.” You revealed.

“A Succubus? What is your current situation?” Mom asked.

“Well they treated me for being unconscious and knocked out by the girl, not knowing I’m a Vampire and all. But otherwise I’m in some kind of dungeon with really thick doors and bars around the windows, not a problem if I wanted to leave but then again I’m not sure how many people know I’m here so if I miss one on the way out they will make a connection that you two know and come after you, I’d rather not have that.” You started.

“Neither would we.” Papa stated.

“However the situation is a little complicated. Apparently there is only 3 things to do when a human sees them in their true forms; mate, seduce, or kill the human. It is up to the girl and she is… well she physically can’t do the first to options yet. But she doesn’t want to just kill me either. She just stormed out after ripping my leg up pretty good. She’s all emotional about it, which I guess is understandable.” You explained.

“But you’re not human.” Mom said.

“However we are, I see your problem Caleb. Even if you reveal yourself as a Vampire they still can’t let you go back to an all human family with their secret. You may have to stay there a while.” Papa said.

“Exactly. If it comes down to it than I can tell them over killing them but I would rather them figure a way around it than me forcing the issue. Either way though I thought I should let you all know that I might be gone for a while. I don’t want you to get involved beyond the concerned parent that you would usually be. So I can’t reveal who they are. But is it ok if I tell them eventually?” You asked.

“We understand, but that last part is up to you. We are more than willing and able to keep your secret Caleb but it is up to you to spread it if you wish. I guess we’ll see you when you get out of wherever you are.” Papa responded.

“Love you Caleb.” Mom said.

“Love you all to.” You responded then cut the connection.

Now the for the waiting as you were forced from the bed by some seduced servants and was left with an empty dungeon cell. Soon enough you were able to realistically take off the bandage, after about a week, and heal the spot but left the scaring just in case they inquired about it. They weren’t large scares but noticeable if one knew where to look. You probed the mind of the slaves they sent in to feed you. It was just bread and water but you didn’t need blood for another few months at this rate. The minds were somewhat void but did retain some individual memories of their lives in the service of Kelsey and her Mother. You learned a bunch about them through this. For starters, mating with one of them is how they contract those they mate or seduce. In that instance a chemical is shot up through a man’s organ as he unloads to which the Succubus in question has to decide wither to use her 1 in 100 year supply of mate designation or to turn them into a slave. A kiss from them to the lips of a human would brainwash them for about a day and their natural hormones they give off in Succubus form make them unresistable for human men. They also ate humans on occasion as a special delicacy but not like you or a snake. They ate the human, usually raw but sometimes cooked, like one would eat a thanksgiving turkey. Carving the prey up and sending them down to the Succubus’ stomach. However they didn’t need human flesh, only craved it and only once in a few years. The rest was pretty standard modes of physical increase; speed, flight (with their wings), strength, sight, smell, and so on.

You could sense everyone in the castle as you sat against the wall of your cell. Kelsey would look at your cell door then run away while her mother and father would scold her on waiting. She really only had one option unless they could come up with an alternative. Can they…?
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Stay and contact your parents.

choices: Her servants can find her and barg in.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Get up human.” ordered Kelsey’s Mom as she entered to which you obeyed, bracing against the far wall from them. Kelsey came in with her then shut the door but was not looking you in the eye, more down at the floor. This told you more than what you needed to know.

“Eve.” You called. You had communicated with your family and had a plan set up. If it looked like they were going to kill you and made you tell them your secret than you would teleport them to the family room and put them on one of Eve’s webs. The web was strong enough to hold you for about 10 minutes even while encased in fire so it would have no problem holding these two. But having such a device read was hard so you had to call her and have her ready and standing by to maintain once you got there.

“They going to kill you?” she asked.

“Probably, please bring the family and be ready. Be sure to remind them that they are succubus and are masters of seduction.” You warned to which she went off and you cut the mind link just in time for Kelsey’s Mom to start talking.

“It seems like Kelsey is having a hard time doing what needs to be done. She keeps you in here, hoping to prolong your worthless life but for what?” she asked as she looked at the still guilt ridden Kelsey. “Can you guess what’s going to happen to you human?”

“I got a fairly good idea. It helps that she doesn’t want to, well for me at least. The way I see it the option is quite clear. If she can’t seduce or mate with me than there is only one option left.” You answered.

“You seem awfully calm about this. You are going to die, most humans try to beg or offer themselves as slaves.” She stated curiously. Not even full adult men acted like you were.

“Well living as a slave wouldn’t be living at all from what I’ve seen of your slaves. As for begging, I never really got into the whole frog posture thing. I mean how impressive is bending down and trying to resemble a wart covered toad while pleading meaningless sentiments that you’ve probably heard a thousand times? Sure I prefer living but if that isn’t an option then might as well live the rest of my life on two feet.” You answered.

“You’re a strange human.” Debora, Kelsey’s mother, said with a giggle of sorts. “However, since Kelsey doesn’t seem up to finishing you, maybe you would like some pleasure before you go.” She offered. This invitation got Kelsey to look up at you than her mother as if betrayed. “What? I’ve never had a boy or man that was like him before and you are incapable. If he’s going to die, might as well do it with his desires fulfilled.”

“Thanks for the offer Miss. Dremer but my parents taught me not to use a woman like that, Succubus or not. Doesn’t matter WHAT someone is, they are still a person first and everything else second.” You answered.

“You… you refused me? Well not again.” She said as her eyes glowed and you could sense the hormones around her form double in strength to ensnare you. “Take off your clothes.” She ordered.

“I do believe I answered that already, and as polite as I could.” You said back, making her take an angered step forward but Kelsey a step back in shock. Obviously no one had told her mother ‘NO’ before, especially not a human male. With an angered motion she plunged her hand into your gut, curving it up so that her nails were stretching into your organs. How unfortunate for her that only silver worked like that, fortunate for you though. You coughed up some blood but then looked her in the eyes and grabbed her arm that was half impaled into you. “You know, I really wish you didn’t do that.”

“What the… there’s no way you’re still alive.” She stuttered in shock but could retract her hand from you as you held it firm. You took a step forward despite her attempt to restrain you and free her arm. You kept going until you were in arm’s reach of Kelsey. With that you turned to mist, teleported, healed, and dropped them into the prepared web, compliments of Eve as the rest of the family sat waiting with Eve on the ceiling and dropped on you when you finally formed back up in the room.

“You’re late.” Eve scolded as she landed on your back and scurried around you, hugging and embracing as she went.

“Awe, you missed me that much?” You asked as she settled on your torso while her legs gripped around your back and you pet her while she was there.

“Of course I missed you. Since when does anyone miss you more than I do?” She almost sobbed.

“True. Ok, next time I get captured by someone I’ll talk with you every night, deal?” You asked.

“Deal, you better not break it.” She stated then jumped back onto the ceiling so you could address the others.

“Kelsey? The Succubus is Kelsey?” Sarah thundered.

“How do you know what we are?” Her mother demanded.

“You don’t get to talk. Caleb does something nice and gets killed for his efforts.” Mom snapped at her.

“To answer your question, Caleb was in telepathic communication with us the entire time. He didn’t tell us who you were for our safety but now we do know. And don’t try any of that seductive stuff, we are pretty well immune to it.” Papa answered.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: They can't and you must die.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“That’s… impossible, come here.” She demanded as she glared her seductive gaze at each person in the room.

“Is she a good person Papa?” Isaac asked as if not even effected at all.

“We’ll see Isaac.” Papa answered.

“How is this possible?” Miss Dremer asked in shock, her most potent seductive gaze not even registering to them.

“What do you mean? Caleb does attractants hundred times better than that all the time. That might work on shallow men and other people but not us.” Luke boasted.

“Is that why you’re blushing?” you asked to which the others laughed at him except the two in the web.

“What the heck is going on?!!!” Miss Dremer hollard in frustration. She couldn’t get free of the web made by a talking and huge ass spider, everyone was just laughing off her attempts at domination, and she couldn’t figure out you at all.

“I thought it obvious by this point, I’m not human.” You revealed as they all looked at her.

“They what are all of you?” She demanded.

“You weren’t listening little Miss bossy pants. He said HE isn’t human, we are accept Eve. She is obviously a spider.” Sarah said back with a little sass to her.

“You keep talking that way human and you’ll be ripped in half once I get out of this.” Miss. Dremer threatened but got no sign of fear from her.

“You don’t seem to get it. I am not letting you go until I can guarantee my family’s safety. After that point, if you were to harm them in any way I would make sure you regretted it before sucking you dry and having Eve here turn the rest of your body into goop and eat the rest of what I can’t. I’ve never actually killed anyone before but I would gladly do it if it meant keeping my family safe from someone like you.” you said in a tone that got her to shut up with a quiver.

“Caleb?” Kelsey finally called from her spot to which you looked over to her.

“Kelsey, I know you didn’t mean anything bad. I read your mind just to be sure. Your family’s rules stink so I don’t really hold it against you. I definitely don’t hold it against you that you kept this a secret. Look at this family and you’ll see we keep a boat load of them. If anything I am glad you aren’t human. Having humans are nice but I wouldn’t mind a few more non human friends.” You said and tears trickled down her face.

“What are you?” Her Mom asked, this time nicer than before.

“A Vampire. Wasn’t one until early last year when the former one passed on her gift to me, which is why I have a human family. I am the only one.” You answered.

“A… V-Vampire…?” she stuttered out in fear.

“See, I told you that Vampires are feared. I don’t even know why myself but I do know that you still make my instincts go crazy.” Eve said from her spot.

“What I wonder is why Vampires are so feared. What did Miss. Isisbelle do to scare them so bad? Or was it one of the stories she passed along to help like the others?” Luke asked.

“I think it has something to do with the immortal genetic knowledge part. I mean I can’t die and I don’t have a weak moment as far as starting out and even before we trained this summer I was still leagues away from these two.” You answered.

“You trained with humans?” Kelsey asked.

“Yeah, that’s where we were all summer. We went up to our cabin and property and we trained. I hunted them, they hunted me; it was a lot of fun and we all got much needed experience and training. It is probably why they are so use to seductive attractants and why Eve has a web strong enough to hold you. It can hold me for about… 20 seconds, more than enough time for her to get a bite in to knock me out for a few days.” You answered.

“You hunted your own family, and you are scolding me?” Miss. Dremer snapped at you.

“Who ever said I killed any of them. Yes I drank from them and hunted them. But I never once killed anyone, and especially not them. No matter what you try you can’t make them turn on me so stop trying.” You hissed back that got her to brace back against the webs that held her. “You don’t get to speak about morality and relating with humans to me.”

“Caleb, can I get down?” Kelsey asked.

“Not right now. We all trust you here Kelsey but I don’t want you to be put in a position where you have to choose your mother or us.” you answered and she inwardly thanked you for it. She might not agree with her mother but she still loved her.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Continue

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Please Mom, can’t you just…” Kelsey pleaded but was interrupted.

“No! They are humans and we are their betters. They live to feed and serve us, not to be friends with.” Miss. Dremer exclaimed.

“I don’t know about this Caleb.” Papa said as he was previously listening to this whole thing and thinking on it. “I know we don’t want for you to kill anyone but we can’t let her go either. I’m not about to have her in our house acting like this and possibly getting loose, no offense Eve.”

“None taken, even my webs can’t last forever. I got to agree. I don’t see this Succubus changing any time soon.” Even replied back. You began floating in the air as you started to think deeply about it.

“You might have to kill her Caleb.” Mom stated rather bluntly, the half naked and seductive woman in her living room not helping her mood.

“No! Please don’t.” Kelsey pleaded as he Mother started to realize where this situation was going. If she didn’t make a major change she could quite possibly be dead.

“Kelsey, I don’t want to kill anyone. But if I let her go and she just comes back and kills some or all of my family than… I can’t take that risk. I am willing to hear other options but I won’t let her do as she wills with my loved ones. Give me something.” You almost challenged and it got them both to think. For the first time you saw them both on the same thought pattern. Her Mom seemed to finally get what was going on. They both saw what you were saying and were thinking of a way to survive.

“What do you want?” Miss. Dremer asked.

“That should be very obvious. Even Isaac knows.” You answered and you all looked over at Isaac as he noticed he had the floor sort of speak.

“Just be nice, no being naughty.” He said in an innocent tone of voice. He was good at that. Whenever you or the others wanted something from your parents you always sent him to ask. He was just too cute for your parents to say no to.

“I don’t get it. You don’t want anything. Just for me to be ‘nice’?” she asked.

“Would it make you feel better if I had you strap on a big bird costume and sing children songs while flying over the city?” you asked and she almost looked offended. “Didn’t think so. I don’t want slaves, or people treating me like I’m some kind of terrible master of sorts. Why can’t we just get along? I know it sounds elementary but why not?”

“Caleb, I don’t get you. I was fully willing to be your slave. A boy your age with a full grown Succubus at his disposal and you just want next to nothing. You’re so…” Miss. Dremer started.

“… weird.” Kelsey finished for her. “He’s always been like that and that’s what I like about him the most. He doesn’t want my body. He wants me, as a friend, nothing more or less complicated”

“Yep, that’s Caleb for you. The loyal, strong, kind, gentle, but sexual idiot.” Sarah joked. “He could have every woman in the city falling all over him but passes on it.”

“Ok, I have no idea what you all are talking about. How about I just take it as a compliment and move on.” You suggested.

“Don’t worry Caleb, it was a compliment but yeah let’s wrap this up. I need to get some sleep.” Sarah stated.

“Caleb, I accept your deal. I’ll be… nicer, as your brother put it and never attack your family in anyway, even if they ask me to.” She said, adding the last part when she thought about what could happen.

“You do? Well that’s a relief. I should probably send you two back then. Your whole house is probably looking for you at this point. Oh, and if you don’t mind keeping me and Eve’s secret? Well you don’t have to but I’m sure you get the idea.” You asked.

“Lips are sealed.” Miss. Dremer said.

“Ok kids, time for bed now that is over.” Papa stated and got a pleasant response as they were all too tired to argue, even the usually tired Isaac. “Caleb, you still have a week’s worth of homework to do before the morning so get to it when you’re done here.”

“Ok.” you responded as he Mom both exchanged kisses with you then went off to bed.

“Eve, can you cocoon me?” Isaac asked.

“Sure thing, race you to your room.” Eve said to which both of them were off and left you in the room with the two succubus.

“Cocoon him?” asked Kelsey.

“Eve cocoons me when I rest in place of a bed. After you know she isn’t going to eat you it is insanely soft and comfortable. Isaac likes it and still wets the bed so the cocoon filters that and Eve cleans up the little sack that appears as a result. You’ve been in my room so you know how soft her webbed silk is.” You answered then moved to Miss. Dremer and rose your hand, looking like you were going for her breast.

“Finally taking me huh?” she asked seductively.

“Uh… don’t really know what that means but whatever.” You said as you placed your hand on her shoulder and she disappeared.

“W… where did she go?” Kelsey asked.

“Teleportation, I just sent her back to that cell we were in. Only place inside your house I have my glyph to teleport you both to.” You answered and came over by her and reached for her shoulder.

“Wait, Caleb… I’m sorry for the… well everything.” She said to you.

“Kelsey, I told you before. You don’t have to apologize. Everything worked out in the end and I don’t have to be alone at school anymore. Now no sense bringing up bad memories ok?” you said to her and she nodded.

“Thank you.” she said right before you teleported her away. After that you didn’t get much rest as you caught up on homework and some more R&R with Eve.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Her mother comes around.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Why do you even let them do that in the first place?” Kelsey asked as you two sat at your lunch table.

“What?” you asked as the question just came out of the blue.

“The Vampire clan, they are so… you being one you must feel irritated by the way they shove their weight around and all that.” Kelsey replied as she looked over at the group of tables that were taken over by the middle school section of the Vampire Clan.

“There are a lot of reasons. Some of them being; They seem comical to me and when I fight them I can’t just wipe them out so I have fun with them. Stuff like standing against a wall and moving at the last second so their fist hits the wall instead of me. That way they can’t accuse me of picking on one of their own. Not to mention that even using none of my strength I can still beat most of them without a problem. I guess another reason would be, it brings to much attention to me and why in the world would I reveal myself to that bunch of idiots?” You asked in conclusion.

“Yeah, I guess that makes sense. But you don’t have to deal with them hitting on you all the time. Ever since I matured they’ve been hounding me for a piece. It is so disgusting.” She said in a shiver as a few were glowering at her, some actually drooling.

“Not my fault you’re so hot now. Here, have some pie.” You said as you pushed a plate with some lemon Morang pie on it. You then got an idea and winked at her, licked your fork clean so your audience could see, then gave it to her. She seemed to be on the same wave length and used it herself. Not like your saliva was disgusting with all the healing properties in it. Plus the desired effect caught on as a sigh and groan could be heard as she used it to which you both chuckled/giggled a little.

“That reminds me, if you’re a… well different how can you eat normal food? Does it even taste good?” she asked.

“I only need blood for nourishment when my reserves run low, and that only happens when I have to use my powers. Miss. Isibelle, the Vampire before me, didn’t drink any for 20 years cause she didn’t use her powers for that long. I’ll admit that normal food is a little less… amazing in taste now but it is hard to say no to my Mom’s cooking.” You answered.

“Did you ever… want to drink from me?” she asked in a blush but shoveled some pie into her mouth to hide her flushed color.

“Of course and now more than ever. I’ve never drank from your kind before. Although I think I would like to try it when fully in your other form to see if it differs from humans. So far though I like human blood the most. They are so diverse and delicious it is hard to describe what it feels like to feed on them or what it tastes like for me.” You answered, subconsciously licking your lips at the prospect of it.

“I can’t believe they are just ok with you feeding on them. Doesn’t it at least hurt? What if they turn?” She asked.

“You really have to experience it for yourself to understand but no it doesn’t hurt and no they don’t turn. Even if I wanted to turn someone I can’t, well not for 2100 years when I have to give the gift to someone else. But even then it isn’t like what you’re thinking. When I give the gift it leaves me and I die and I don’t have a choice in the time frame. If I don’t give it to someone then it is taken and goes into someone randomly. As far as pain… the bite stimulates arousal so the most common thing that happens when I suck their blood is they don’t want me to stop, even knowing that if I don’t they will die.” You revealed.

“I… I might not be up for experiencing it for a while, no offense.” She said after finishing her pie.

“That’s cool, I’m not desperate or always thinking about it like the stories say. I’d rather have you as a friend than a feeding sack in any case. Just if you’re curious you don’t have to be shy about it.” You offered casually enough to be an afterthought.

“Do you really think I’m hot?” she asked, again blushing.

“Sure, I’ve always said so even before you hit maturity.” You answered as you tossed your garbage and hers in the trash like usual. “But it means nothing to me without the person behind it. I could get any girl if all I wanted was a body slave with no substance or depth. Although that’s coming from someone who’s only real friends are a 3 foot tall spider who is still growing and a Succubus. Can’t really say that my opinion is unbiased.”

“I guess you’re right about that. As for me, I can’t really accept most guy’s opinion until at least High School. Most of them are still in the middle of puberty and don’t know what they want, and most just want an ass to slap.” She commented.

“Hey, at least you can have kids.” You said, trying to cheer her up a bit.

“You can’t?” she asked as if heartbroken and sorry for you at the same time.

“Nope. I can’t turn anyone until it’s time and that includes passing on my enhanced DNA to children. Still have all my normal functions down there but they’re just for show. It’s a good thing when you think about it. If a Vampire could have kids than there would be a bunch of arrogant ones around like in the movies and such. For the world’s sake I’m kind of glad I can’t or that hasn’t happened.” You said with a cover smile. Secretly it bothered you that you would never be able to have a traditional family of your own.

“And here I thought we had it bad only having one kid for 200 years of life. But at least you have a huge extended family you can hang around with.” She said partially sad about 3 things; first that you couldn’t be her mate, second that you could NEVER have kids, third that she could only have one. But she added the last part to lift both your spirits up. It seemed to work as both of you exchanged smiles just in time for the bell to ring for lunch to be over.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Perks of not being alone.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“So these are the two trouble makers.” Grandma Konel said as she looked at Kelsey and Mrs. Dremer imposingly.

“Um… Hi Mrs. Konel, my name is Kelsey Dremer, a friend of Caleb’s and this is my Mother.” Kelsey introduced. Only the two of them came as her elderly father was too old and weak to make the trip. They rarely celebrated Christmas because the excitement of such an event was too much for his heart but he insisted them come to yours.

“Yes, yes. Caleb has told me all about you two.” She said which made it sound like she was mad at them. But that vanished when she Gave Kelsey a full on hug then let her breath. “You don’t have to worry about fitting in around her. After we all got use to Caleb a few more, ‘freaks’ as we like to call you all, are more than welcome.”

“Indeed, we are happy that he has someone other than Eve to hang around with that isn’t human.” Grandpa Konel stated.

“He told you?” Mrs. Dremer asked.

“Well of course, there are no secrets in this family but we also know how to keep them from others. We even made a rule about it. The only people outside our family that get to know about this kind of stuff must go with us to our big family vacation in the summer.” Grandma Lon said.

“Vacation?” Kelsey asked.

“We did it this last year. Basically it is our time to train Caleb to be, what we guess, to be a proper Vampire. Since he works so hard in being human he needs to work on his other side to. Not to mention we need education on how to protect ourselves against ‘freaks’ like him. It is more of a double sided boot camp where he physically trains during the day and works on his Vampire moves during events that we set up. He hunts us all other times but isn’t allowed in the cabin main area but can go into the sleeping area. It is so much fun trying to find ways to kill him.” Uncle Matt interjected.

“You try to kill him? How can you do something like that?” Mrs. Dremer asked, more confused than concerned.

“Oh that’s easy, I can’t die.” You said as you walked into the room. “They have got me good a few times though. Uncle Jim managed to cut off my head once. Maybe you two would like to join us some time. They need all the help they can get.”

“So they all know what we are?” asked Kelsey.

“Sure, you can transform if you want. Just try to keep the seduction down. It is a family thing and there are kids around.” You offered.

“But they are humans.” Mrs. Dremer interjected. “They will run and hide and panic.”

“You think so? Watch this.” You stated then went over to Katie, one of your cousins that was begging you to drink her blood but kept her desires to a minimum for the event. You sat by her and whispered in her ear. She smiled and then you grabbed her and sank your fangs into her neck. The two that watched couldn’t figure out what was so interesting; that you would just do that on a whim or that no one even gave it a second glance. It wasn’t that they were under a spell, they just didn’t care. The few that did look seemed to be jealous if anything but just went on socializing. You didn’t take much then retracted and licked her neck clean then your lips of any excess blood. You whispered in her ear again a thank you then went back to them. “See, they don’t really care. Sure they may think you are a new and interesting, ‘freak’ as they like to call us, but unless you do something morally bad they aren’t going to care that much. They may even ask you to do something. But it is up to us to say no. After all, we are a Christian family so some of your… talents would be a little too… much for them but they might still ask you to do it. In which case they trust us to say no.”

“So they won’t react badly?” Mrs. Dremer asked.

“It depends on your definition of ‘badly’. The kids are kids after all and misbehave just like any other. With us they just have a larger variety of things they can do. They like to put silver tacks on my seats and sometimes draw blood and wipe it places to tease me. But if you are asking if they will put you to the stake or something than the answer is no. Some may be a little rough until they get use to you but that is only natural.”

“So you don’t mind if I…?” Kelsey asked as she gestured to her back as if referring to her wings.

“Go ahead, they won’t mind.” You answered to which she did. Wings sprung from her back as did her tail, along with the other enhancements that came with it but her clothes kept her from being too provocative. Everyone in the room looked over at her in stunned silence and she began to blush and get nervous at this.

“Miss. Kelsey, you are really pretty.” Said Little Samuel as he reached and grabbed her soft tail, all of his ‘r’s were pronounced in an adorable ‘w’ sound. Kelsey smiled as she saw him rub his face into her soft tail to which she wrapped him a little with it and he laughed as the velvety surface tickled him. Isaac ran from the room then returned with Dana and pointed at her.

“See, told you she looks like an angel.” Isaac blurted out which made Dana’s eyes sparkle. Pleased with how her daughter was fairing Mrs. Dremer did likewise as her wings and features came out. She too was wearing a more conservative piece than before and those that were in the room gazed at them both with wonder. She watched in delight as Dana’s eyes sparkled even more with this development.

“Ha, with looks like that I bet you both have a whole line of boys for ya.” Grandpa Lon blurted out and it got both them to blush and everyone to break the silence they were in with laughter. The way he said it was in his usual comical manor that only a Grandpa like him could do. Soon both of them joined in the laughter and the evening continued.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Christmas is different this year.

choices: Succubus gifts are different than normal ones.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Wow, you’re family is so nice. I didn’t know humans could be this much fun.” Mrs. Dremer stated. She obviously was use to just using humans to get what she wanted and not much more than that. Finding out that they were was intriguing to her.

“I know, believe me, last year was way different.” You stated as you three looked over the room of people as kids ran by, people talked, and all the business of Christmas. The 3 of you were getting a lot of attention, particularly them.

“How so?” Kelsey asked.

“Well can I ask why your kind fear Vampires so much?” you asked and they slightly looked down and away before Kelsey turned to you.

“Our history says that the succubus race was once a larger race with hundreds of branches. But they/we made the mistake of threatening the Vampire lord at the time and he rendered the entire population down to 3. Thousands of years has passed since then as the story was passed down but we were always told that if we were to meet a Vampire to run to prevent accidentally offending the Vampire in question and having him or her destroy the rest of us. There are only 20 of us in the world right now.” Mrs. Dremer revealed then looked hesitantly to you.

“I see. You don’t need to worry. It would take a lot for me to kill anyone, much more to wipe out an entire race. Too young for all that kind of stuff. As for last year; As you can tell the rumors and fiction surrounding Vampires did not paint a good picture of me to them. So last year I received more death threats than anything. They have come to accept people like us more, probably because of our little vacation. Each day they would provide me with a free neck to feed on and all of them were required to take a turn to show them that it wasn’t a bad experience.” You responded back to them.

“It isn’t?” Mrs. Dremer asked, slightly confused.

“Just biting alone stimulates pleasure in the body to increase the willingness of the prey and blood flow. By the time I pull away it is like… well my Aunt said it is like stopping in the middle of an orgasm, have to take her word on it but it does feel really good. And since Miss. Isibelle had to bite me to pass it on I know what it feels like. It is near double of that feeling for me so it takes a lot of control to stop. Trust me, beginning is the easy part for both sides.” You explained.

“Would you mind if I felt it?” Mrs. Dremer asked to Kelsey’s shock.

“Mom?” Kelsey almost scolded.

“You mean you never let him drink your blood? You two are like best friends.” Mrs. Dremer asked.

“She doesn’t feel comfortable with it. Unless we are on the vacation, I don’t force myself on anyone or let them ask me on peer pressure alone. If they really don’t want to than I won’t feed on them, even if I’m starving.” You intersected.

“Well that’s noble of you. But do you have a good reason why I shouldn’t?” Mrs. Dremer asked more her daughter than you.

“I… No, I guess not. I just kind of wanted to do it before you.” She revealed.

“Well, why don’t you two think about it for a while. I wouldn’t do it right now anyway. My Mom and the other women in my family made a lot of food and she’ll smack me a new one if I ruin my appetite.” You again interjected to prevent any kind of arguing.

“We are free to join your meal?” Mrs. Dremer asked to which she heard Kelsey giggle at her question. “What?”

“I forgot you never saw the Konel’s style meal. If there is one thing I know about Caleb’s family is that they can cook and they can eat, a lot. I’ve never seen his Mom make too little of food, you’ll see.” Kelsey stated. And none too soon as Grandma Lon yelled down that the meal was ready. The 3 of you waited for the rest to pass before heading up, their wings taking extra space but when the 3 of you got to the table they were all waiting for you.

“Oh my…” Mrs. Dremer gasped at the massive amount of very good looking food that teased every single one of her senses. But she was wondering why they were all looking at you 3, actually you were wondering the same.

“Well, last year we all embarrassed ourselves badly with Caleb so all the ‘freaks’ get their spots first and we’ll fill in after.” Grandpa Konel stated to which Eve took a spot on the Ceiling above the table, and you guided the two winged angel looking succubus to seats next to you. After that they all were more than anxious to sit and, after prayer and a few words, the feasting began.

“Oh, don’t be shy. How much you want?” Mom asked as she passed the stuffing to Kelsey on one side of you. “Caleb is just going to eat it all if you don’t take some.” Mom stated to which she put a good portion on her plate. It was no exaggeration as you took a huge mound of the stuff before passing it along and they finally got the message and ate their fill along with you. Unlike last year, you didn’t have to dodge the silver dishes.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: continue with christmas.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
Mrs. Dremer and Kelsey came and went from Christmas and little by little Mrs. Dremer began seeing humans as more of people rather than just objects. Neither of them let you drink from them yet, they were too afraid of Vampires through the legend to allow it but were starting to come around. Vampire clan moved in on Kelsey on more than one occasion but the school versions were nothing much and you made a mental note to deal with them sooner or later. Papa had told you to wait until next year as it was almost Summer and you all had your vacation to look forward to. However a strange man came to the door one day at the beginning of summer. It was 2 weeks till your whole family along with Kelsey would be free to go up. Her Mom was watching over her dying husband but insisted on Kelsey going. However this man was strange as he came to the door and gave a few solid knocks to it.

“Hello, can I help you?” Mom asked as the large man, near 7 feet tall and build like a tree, stood above her. He had a black cloak on and underneath was a robe with your glyph on it. However he was obviously not someone you had entrusted it to. Your mother took note of it but didn’t flinch as she looked up to him and Papa joined her at the door.

“I was and always will be a servant of Lady Isibelle. I am here on her last order to me and I will complete it.” The man said in a deep ominous voice as he looked down at them.

“Isibelle? Yes, come in. Papa, can you lead him downstairs while I call Caleb. I have a feeling this man would like to see him.” Mom said.

“I wish to see the one she gave her gift.” he almost demanded.

“Caleb is our son.” Papa said after shutting the door behind the entering and towering man. “He is the one that inherited Isibelle’s… gift. But we don’t talk about such things in detail where others can easily overhear. We have a soundproof room downstairs where we talk about such delicate matters.”

“Very well.” he said then followed and sat in the room. You didn’t arrive for another half hour to which you Mother told you about the man and escorted you down to see him. He stood immediately when you walked into the room and bowed. “Master Caleb, I am honored with your presence.”

“Thank you, but if I recall I don’t remember enslaving you. Not that I mind the respect but why are you calling me ‘Master’?” You asked

“My Lady charged me with your training once a year after you had a full year to adjust to the gift she gave. I am here to fulfill that duty. Until you are what compares to a proper Vampire I am to remain and instruct.” He answered.

“Mr…?” You asked

“Vale.” He answered with another lighter but still noticeable bow.

“Mr. Vale, we are going to go up north for such training in 2 weeks. I admit we don’t really know what standards are meant for a proper Vampire but we do work out there.” You informed.

“Master, with respect, you can’t learn how to become a Vampire from humans. You must learn from other Vampires, as weak as they would be compared to you.” He interjected.

“But Miss. Isibelle said I was the only one. How can I learn from other Vampires?” You asked as your parents listened in silently.

“My Lady worked with fictional stories to not only spread lies about Vampires to protect you but also to construct means of which to enter those stories to learn from the Vampires she created. In each ‘realm’ she has established a lesson to be learned and abilities to awaken as you live in them. She also estimated that that time would be an issue. So while you would spend years at times inside a realm it would only be the length of the realm from this side that passes for both you and those outside of it.” He explained.

“Wait a second. Are you trying to tell me that she had links so that she could create Vampire Movies and stuff so I could enter those ‘realms’ and learn?” You asked. You had to admit that without sleeping you’ve been daydreaming about kicking around some of the Vampires in those movies and T.V. shows. But you never thought that you would be presented with the ability to do so.

“Yes Master.” He said with yet another bow. “If you have a time restraint than we should start right away.”

“Doesn’t look like I have much choice if Miss. Isibelle went through all this trouble just to teach me. Papa, Mom, what do you think?” You asked as you looked over to them.

“W… We agree Caleb. As long as you are back by the time we have to leave I see no problem with it.” Papa said after thinking on it a bit and looking at Vale.

“He should be back in a week’s time from this first one.” Vale answered then turned to you. “Of course it will be longer for you while inside the realm. Are you ready Master?” he asked.

“I guess so. So where am I going?” You asked to which he pulled out a series known as…
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Continue.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Ok then Master I will escort you to the Headmaster.” Vale stated once he had brought you inside the realm of Vampire Knight.

“Ok, you sure it is ok to tell him about me being a Vampire? I never actually watched the series you brought me into.” You asked him as you walked down a long path into an expensive looking school.

“Have no fear Master. As this will be your first I visited the realm before you and made sure that you would be accepted in any way you wish. Beyond that it will be up to you to make the best of it. It is training after all, not a vacation. However that doesn’t mean you can’t have a little fun.” Vale answered.

“Thank you Mr. Vale.” You replied as you looked around.

“I am here to serve Master. No need to thank me.” Vale responded in a respective tone that you’ve heard in those old king and queen movies.

“Apparently so but Papa and Mom always said to respect my elders and thank people when they do something for me, no matter how small. I’m afraid you’re just going to have to accept my thanks cause I can’t help but give it.” You said back.

“My Lady Isibelle chose well indeed. I can see you are inexperienced but have a pure heart.” Vale said to you as he took a rare direct look at you then returned it to scoping out the area.

You simply blushed a little at the compliment. You then looked around at the beautiful area as the sun hit you and you soaked in the rays. You stopped in front of a door and waited. Maybe it was because it was a different realm but the sun’s warmth felt especially good as you sat on a bench waiting for admittance into the school. You lost yourself in the feeling as you took in the sound of the wind around the trees, the scents that came with that wind, and the warmth of the sun on your skin. Vale was inside and you didn’t notice them approach until they were right next to you.

“So this is our new guest. Funny, I’ve never seen your kind enjoy the daylight so much.” Said a man that seemed carefree but as you snapped out of your trance and looked over at him you saw he was analyzing you deeply, despite his calm and inviting gaze. You stood and bowed to him like you had seen him do.

“I… I get that a lot. Well for people that know about me anyway.” You stated then straightened. “My name is Caleb, honor to meet you.”

“Oh and polite as well, how wonderful. I am Headmaster Cross and the feeling is mutual. Why don’t you come inside and we can start.” He suggested to which you looked at Vale.

“This is where we part ways Master. I will be back to collect you when the time is right but for now your training begins. I have helped you all that my Lady Isibelle would allow.” He said with a bow.

“Thanks again Mr. Vale.” You said and he continued his bow until you followed the Headmaster inside then almost vanished, probably outside of the realm.

Shortly after being led down a series of hallways you entered a room that looked to be the Headmaster’s office to see 3 other people. One was as tall as you were with black hair and generally attractive features. The second was a girl that was shorter than all in the room with similarly black hair. The last was a white or silver haired boy, now standing but his sitting spot was facing and away from the boy in with the black hair. Their scent gave them away as different then Cross’s scent and you assumed that they were all Vampires but since only one of them were wearing a different color set of clothes, white instead of black, you figured that the other two either were hiding their nature or it somehow didn’t awaken yet. Since it wasn’t the same with your gift you didn’t intend on pressing on it. Besides, the girl actually smelled rather delicious from a food standpoint.

“Caleb, may I introduce Kaname, Yuuki, and Zero. Besides me and the other Night class students they will be the only ones that know about your being a Vampire. Compliments of your Mr. Vale, we have been told slightly of your unique strain of Vampirism.” Headmaster introduced. You presented a bow to which only Yuuki returned. It was a good thing you didn’t try to go for a hand shake.

“Let’s get this over with.” Zero scowled and they all sat down in different reactions to his comment.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: ...Vampire Knight.

choices: Moving in with the night class.
Moving in with the day class.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“So where do you come from?” asked Kaname as he seemed to be gauging you like the others.

“That’s tricky, didn’t Vale say anything about that?” you asked.

“He told me you were from another world but that was it. I thought he was joking.” Headmaster said as he laughed and the others continued to look to you for an answer.

“It’s pretty accurate. I still come from earth but a different version of it. I was sent here because on my… world I guess… I am the only Vampire. The gift is passed down from person to person but can’t be spread any more than that. The former Vampire determined me worthy and passed it to me about a year and a half ago. Mr. Vale was one of her servants and was instructed as her last command to help train me by going to different worlds that had Vampires and learn from them. So that brings me here.” You explained as quickly as you could.

“That can’t be possible.” Yuuki stated.

“Well the only way to prove it would be to take you to that world. Since I can’t do that and Vale holds the Key I’m stuck here. But I am different from what legend says normal Vampires are… I think. Like I said, I was sent here to train. I don’t know what I am capable of without someone to teach me a little. I got a handle on some of it though.” You replied nervously scratching your head.

“You’re different, how?” Zero asked, concerned that he didn’t know something that could help him fight them/ you.

“No offense, but why would I tell you that?” You asked. “I mean it just doesn’t seem smart to broadcast my strengths and weaknesses. Unless it is a common thing around here, in which case I suggest you go first so I can see how it’s done.” You clarified to his sulking face.

“We are only referring to things we NEED to know. If you are different and need certain things to survive than as you would be living here it would be wise to learn such things to provide for you.” Headmaster stated.

“Ok, well I guess that’s ok. For starters I don’t know what others can do but from the legends of my old world I’ll take off from there; I actually like the sunlight although my power increases in the dark. I’m not affected by any symbol as part of a cleansing or slaying effect. I can eat normal food and don’t leave ANY evidence of feeding when drinking from someone. In a sense I only need blood if I use my Vampire powers. My former was at the 20 year mark without drinking any when she passed the gift onto me. I’m not that strong but if I don’t use anything then I can last for about a year or so. But considering just walking around wastes energy I’d need some blood at some point, especially if you wanted me to do something that requires a lot of power” you explained, trying to hit all the big points without saying anything that would come back and harm you later.

“And people just let you drink from them in your world… disgusting.” Zero snapped.

“Not really, well my human family does but that’s different. It actually feels good when I do it.” You defended.

“Really, Now I’m interested. How does ridding someone of their blood feel good to them.” Kaname asked, obviously it wasn’t the case in this world.

“Well my saliva acts as a healing agent to seal up the holes of feeding so there is no scares or worry of scares. The bite itself forcibly arouses the… uh prey I guess… to speed up the blood flow and increase the willingness of the one I am feeding on. By the end they are actually begging me to continue as the feeling multiplies until they are bled dry. I have had to knock them out to get them to allow me to stop a few times. Either way the ONLY ill effect they have upon me drinking from them is loss of blood. I can’t turn anyone even if I wanted to nor could I leave my fang marks on anyone, again, even if I wanted to.” You explained then looked to Zero who was obviously fighting the urge to do something unpleasant to you. “If it makes you feel any better. I usually get blood from packaged blood via hospitals and such and I never drink from anyone that isn’t willing beforehand, and truly willing not because I made them so.”

“You don’t?” Yuuki asked.

“It is only my second year as a vampire and my whole family is still human. They raised me to respect others and my Mom would rip me a new one if she found out I did otherwise.” You joked and it lightened the mode a little. As a happy by product of making her smile Kananme did as well.

“Caleb, why don’t you try this.” Headmaster said as he handed you a glass of red liquid that smelled like blood but also different, like a synthetic version. You sipped at it then drank the whole glass down in one shot but like using a straw without one visible. “You like it?”

“It is tasty, more so then juice or some other human drink. But if you are asking if I can use it to replace actual blood…” you said then paused and looked into yourself to see if it would work, it didn’t. “Doesn’t look like it. It doesn’t have any life in it. The point of me drinking isn’t to satisfy hunger, although that is a part of my craving it. It is more to replenish power and that only comes from blood that was once in a living creature, human or otherwise.”

“Wait, you can drink from something else other than humans?” asked Zero, strangely it looked like he was hoping it would work for him.

“Yes, to be honest human blood is leagues better but I can replace it with animal blood or… dead blood from corpses if I have to. But please don’t make me drink dead blood, even if it works that stuff is like drinking rotten vinegar with turd chunks mixed in… yuck.” You answered and shook your head to get rid of the memory. “But otherwise, if is ok, I can just hunt for animals.”

“I… I think that would ok.” Headmaster stated after thinking on it.

“Would you ever NEED human blood?” Kaname asked as he was still figuring things out.

“Only if I was to do something really strenuous and there was no other blood around. But like I said, I would rather starve then drink from an unwilling source.
