choices: It allows you to use magic
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
You were all returned to your family, followed by Dumbledore. He paused in a way that indicated that he wished a word with you. You sent your family along with Kelsey and the others to start unpacking. You had seen that some of your younger cousins were anxious to get their Disney Vacation started and refusing them too much longer might not be such a good idea.

“Is there something you wanted?” You asked Dumbledore as he turned to you.

“In a manner of speaking. You see, Lady Isibelle, was a wonderful woman. She brought me here and gave me a measure of immortality, while I am here and effectively stopping time from my world. I am very grateful to her for allowing me to remain here as long as she had…” Dumbledore started.

“But you would like to return to your time?” You asked, assuming he wanted to go home.

“Eventually, and I suspect that you might want to visit my realm at that time. But that is not why I stopped you…” He responded. He then held out a lavishly decorated box that, even without holding it, you could tell had immense magical sealing properties. You took it, then hesitantly opened it. Inside was a ring that looked very simple but for the color of blood red. You could also tell that the box was containing the even more immense magical energy that seemed to resonate from the ring.

“I… I don’t know if you heard me, before. But I really don’t like magic at the moment.” You said in the most polite tone possible.

“Lady Isibelle was well aware of your kind’s weakness for magic. That is why she commissioned me to make this ring. She wanted to give you the opportunity to visit places like my world without fear of magic.” Dumbledore started.

“What exactly does the ring do?” You asked.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Dumbledore has a gift for you!

choices: You are too scared and wear the ring all the time.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Putting it simply, it blocks out any magical energy that is used on you, like a shield.” Dumbledore said as you glanced at the ring.

“Why isn’t something like this given to everyone?” You asked, thinking that there was a side effect that might kill you. Despite him being here and making this from Miss. Isibelle’s request, you still didn’t trust him as a mage quite yet.

“Because everyone has a little bit of magic in them. It is connected to their life force. All except undead level of creatures. While you are not completely undead, you also share the fact that you have no magic in you, which is why you can’t perform magic. To that effect, if a human were able to wear this ring, it would kill them because it would block their minute magical power connected to their life force. That is why I put a block on it. No one that can die from it will be able to handle it… And it is keyed to your specific DNA, once you put it on.” Dumbledore answered.

“Why would I want to take it off then?” You asked, looking at the thing.

“Well, its effect is both a blessing and a curse. Sure it blocks magic from reaching you, but that doesn’t exclude any helpful spells you may or may not want to partake in. Such as healing or even power striping spells, like the ones here at Disney. That ring will block ALL magic, good or bad.” Dumbledore replied.

“You have power striping spells here?” You asked, slightly alarmed.

“Of course! Think about it. How much fun will it REALLY be to go on a roller coaster? You are probably a hundred times faster than our fastest ones. Not to mention that the ‘magic shows’ may be lost on you, as there is a fair amount of slight of hand rather than actual magic. So the experience wouldn’t be as good for you… unless we were able to bring you down to a more human level to enjoy it. It also keeps a level of security here. Wither it be Vampire or giant, Succubus or wind sprite; not too many will have an advantage over your average day to day human… making the place that much safer.” Dumbledore explained in a calm manner that helped you calm down as well.

“But putting this ring on would protect me from even those spells?” You asked

“Correct.” Dumbledore repeated.

“What if I lose it, or someone steals it?” You asked.

“That is quite impossible, after you put it on. Have you seen my realm’s movies?” He asked, to which you nodded. “It is similar to the Sword of Gryffindor. If it is separated from you, once it is keyed to your DNA, then when you need it, it will simply appear for you to find it.”

“Can I put it on now?” You asked.

“Oh, such a polite young man.” Dumbledore complimented, then continued. “Yes. In fact I would recommend you do so. Just so I can see for myself that you were bound to it properly and no one has an opportunity to steal this VERY powerful magic ring. You can always take if off afterward.”

You nodded then reached for the ring. It was strange. You had assumed that reaching for such a magical item would make you nervous and agitated. But on the contrary, it made you calmer as you got closer. You assumed that it was because of its effect. A protection ring would make you feel protected after all. When you touched it, you felt an immense amount of power flow through you. Almost enough to make you jump back, or fall back more like it. Anyway, you grasped it and slowly put it on your right ring finger. You could feel the power flowing through you subside and settle, then feel as if it wasn’t even there. You pulled it off, just to make sure it could come off and that it wasn’t a trap of some kind, then put it back on. This time there was no power surge. So you took it off and put it back in its box, sealing it again.

“I trust you are satisfied…?” Dumbledore asked.

“I… I think so. I mean I guess I won’t really know until I wear it and someone throws a lot of magical energy to me in the attempt to do me harm.” You answered.

“You are a Vampire, young man, I will be surprised if you have to wait very long for such a thing. Have you ever known an enemy NOT use a weakness of their target?” He answered, you thought about it and shrugged an agreement. “But worry not, while you are at Disney, such attacks will NOT happen. Believe me when I say that much more powerful Witches, Wizards, and Mages have made this place of magic a VERY safe place. I implore you to try NOT to have fun, see how that works out.”

For the first time, you smiled to him. “Thank you, Mr. Dumbledore.”

“I will have to talk to your parents to compliment them on the polite young man they have raised.” He complimented with his trademark smile, before you two parted ways and you joined your family to enjoy your vacation in Disney.

She wants you to allow her to not be tied down to ONE person (YOU)
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Told you that you wouldn’t regret it!” Kelsey encouraged as you just got off another ride.

It took some convincing, but your family was able to convince you that Disney wouldn’t harm you in the sense that you had come to expect out of those that practiced magic. You had felt, as you entered the parks, that the intense magical energy was taking away a very large portion of your active powers. While you had no doubt that if you needed it, your full power would still be accessible, you were currently enjoying something you hadn’t experienced in years… many year. That is, what it felt like to be human.

“I admit, this is really fun.” You relented.

You went to a parade and was delighted that you, at times, couldn’t tell what was magic and what was not. Your family seemed to have a better time when they saw how happy you were.

“I know, right!?” Kelsey replied as she enjoyed a funnel cake. “Everything tastes better here. Usually I hate these things, but I swear that I will gain 100 pounds if I don’t stop now… or after one last bite…”

“I really do miss these tastes…” You said in agreement as you took a bite out of a turkey leg. You looked at each other, smiled then handed each other the food you were enjoying then continued eating.

“Caleb, can I have a word?” Mrs. Dremer asked as you and Kelsey moved about the crowd. Your family was too big to go everywhere with each other. So most scattered and were having fun. After all, each were given an endless credit limit to spend on as they wished, you were all instructed to charge it to the rooms and it would be taken care of.

“Sure…” You answered as you took a seat and Kelsey moved to do the same.

“Alone, if you don’t mind dear.” Kelsey’s Mother said, which got an almost offended look from her. “It won’t take long, I promise. Don’t worry, nothing funny.”

“Ok, but hurry. I want to show Caleb everything about Disney and we only have a week to do it.” Kelsey stated then hurried into a store that caught her eye. It looked to be one that specialized in selling glass and crystal things.

“What did you need to see me about?” You asked.

“Well… I understand that I can’t force you to do anything, Caleb, nor would I want to. If you don’t mind me saying so, you have become like a son to me. Not that there is anything wrong with your Mother…” She stumbled around nervously. There was obviously something serious or semi-serious on her mind, but didn’t want to offend you.

“Don’t worry, I think of you the same. I consider you all family at this point. I am glad that you feel the same!” You said with a smile.

“Ok, well, and forgive me for being blunt, but I worry for Kelsey.” Mrs. Dremer stated rapidly, trying to get it all out before she could stop herself.

“What do you mean?” you asked.

“Caleb, I know that you are… not as insightful about women, girls, and like topic, especially what is on their minds and how we work. Wither we be human or of mythical standing. But there is something that I thought obvious enough at this point. Kelsey… she likes you. I dare say that she may love you, not just in the family sense either.” Mrs. Dremer stated, a sense of nervousness and unease in her demeanor.

“You’re right, I am clueless when it comes to this kind of thing… Why would she be interested in me? She could get anyone she wants…?” You asked.

“Caleb, there you go again. You must realize by now that you are very attractive. Not just your body either. Being… what you are, has made you very desirable. Even if you were a horrible person, your body, power, and status would be enough to invoke responses from any female regardless of species. But your honor, kindness, loyalty, and other morally good traits make you even more so. You don’t know how good of a catch you are.” Mrs. Dremer answered.

“But I…” you started. But apparently Mrs. Dremer had no intention of having you finish.

“Caleb, really, your humility is admirable. But what I am stating is fact. You will find many people trying to gain your favor. But this is where I fear for Kelsey. She… well, as I’ve said, she likes you and perhaps more than that.” Mrs. Dremer stated.

“And you want me to…?” You asked, wondering if she was getting to the ‘stay away from my daughter’ speech or something like that.

“Don’t get me wrong, Caleb. I couldn’t find a better person for my daughter to love. But there is another issue here. One that humans in this situation, don’t have to deal with.” Mrs. Dremer hinted. She left you thinking for a moment until she saw your expression change with understanding.

“You are talking about her having kids, aren’t you?” You asked.

“Yes. Forgive me Caleb, but I know that you are incapable of having them. One of the safeguards for being a Vampire. But, a Succubus, we are lucky to have 2 kids in the 200 years we are alive.” She responded then continued after she saw you were following. “The thing is, Caleb, if you two were to fall in love and spend your lives together, you would outlive her and she would have NO children. After all, why would she love another when she has you? You two would probably find it a very bad thing to have sex with anyone but each other. So, she wouldn’t even be able to contribute that way. And, again forgive me for my bluntness, Lady Isibelle did a number on the Succubus race about a thousand years ago. We, as a species, need every baby Succubus we can get. Each one is precious, even the ones that MIGHT be born. As much as I love my husband. I know he will die and I will have to find another quickly to have another child in the next 50 years…”

She stopped talking as you both saw Kelsey come out and look over at you two. Her mother gave he a shake of the head to tell her that she wasn’t done talking to you, to which Kelsey looked fondly at you then moved on to another store. You had a feeling she was racking up quite a bill. The thought of it brought a smile on your face then realized that Mrs. Dremer was right. While you and Kelsey had a very strong relationship as friends, it was now clear that Kelsey wanted more. It was like your eyes were opened to all the hints she had dropped over that last few years. They had become stronger and more obvious, and for all her attempts, you were still too clueless to pick them up.

“What do you think we should do?” You asked, finally understanding and taking it seriously.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Fun at Disney

choices: You let her know right away.
You let her happiness flow for a while before letting her know.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“I am not sure I can do that…” You stated. Growing up in a Christian home, there were certain rules, not to mention society rules on letting your significant other have sexual relations with another person, particularly if you decided to escalate it to marriage.

“Caleb, I know that you are a good boy and you have been raised to see things a certain way. But a Succubus is not a human, just like you are not. We of the Succubus race are literally made to have sex with humans and multiple partners. Granted we usually have a significant amount of loyalty once we choose our love mate, but we are not humans. I am not saying that you must go by this code as well. But you must understand; if you want a relationship with Kelsey, then I implore you to think of her as she is and what she means to her people. She needs to produce a child. If you can’t let her do this while you are alive, then… she will never have a child.” Mrs. Dremer stated in a definite tone.

You knew she was right. While you didn’t like the whole multiple partners thing, even in the Bible it showed maid servants and things of that such that great men of the Bible had sex with. Wither they were right or wrong was beyond your understanding at the moment, but it was still there. In this case, the fate of entire race was at stake. You also had a vampire pride thing going on. You now realized that you also had feelings for Kelsey. Your own cluelessness was blinding you that she would have feelings for you. But now you understood and, as a Vampire, wanted her to yourself. Both feelings were an obstacle that was preventing Kelsey from moving on and being the mother she was meant to be for her people.

“When does she have to have kids?” You asked.

“I did so rather late…” Mrs. Dremer started then continued, “… I was 70 when I had Kelsey. I will need to have another when I am 170 at the earliest. Leaving me 30 years to raise my next daughter” She explained.

“That isn’t a lot of time…” You stated, still heavily thinking about what you were going to do.

“May I make a suggestion?” Mrs. Dremer asked.

“Certainly…” You answered, deeply hoping she had the answer.

“Well, if you were to have a relationship with her until she finds a good friend that you both like, and marries him. That way, you can continue your relationship, assumingly with her husband’s blessing, but while he is alive you be their family’s guardian. I understand that it may be the only time you may be considered a father figure… In this case, you stay connected but save your own morals. The way the Succubus mind works, her husband will have a connection with her that will prioritize him over you during their marriage. That will help her relationship with him. You, will still be there when he passes on and your love for each other remain, with a daughter to help Kelsey raise.” Mrs. Dremer suggested.

“And what if we go our separate ways at some point?” You asked, unsure if that would put you at odds with their family.

“Forgive me for saying this, but that would be problem solved. Either way, Kelsey would be happy, and have children. Again, we are Succubus, our minds are ok with that kind of thing.” She answered.

“What should I do now, about this whole thing?” You asked.

“Well… YOU are probably the only one I would allow near her in that manner until she is at least 40. So, take it as slowly as you two wish. But I suggest you be honest with her so you both can start searching for her future husband.” She answered.

“Ok, this may be more difficult that I am used to…” You answered.

“But you are a Vampire, can’t be harder that being shot at and taking down enemies all the time…?” Mrs. Dremer said, hoping to cheer you up.

“Bullets I can handle, even silver ones. Girls and feelings…, that is uncharted for me.” You replied.

“Well, as a veteran in this sort of thing, you can count on me if you need the advice.” Mrs. Dremer replied with a smile and drew you into a genuine hug. It was obvious she was nervous about this whole thing for a while, both in addressing you as the Vampire and her Daughter’s emotional health in this regard. “Thank you Caleb.”

“Hey!!!” Kelsey said as she saw her mother embracing you and ran over. “MOM…!!!”

“What, I was just saying ‘thank you’,” Mrs. Dremer defended and assured.

“Then why is he acting weird?” She asked as you two separated and you glanced at her in a new fashion. But you decided to head this off and be assertive with her for once.

“Kelsey, would you like to go out with me?” You asked, almost making her fall over and her Mother to smile ear to ear. She would probably thank you more over later for making it seem like she had something to do with this dream come true for her.

“YES!!!” She shrieked, making a few around you to look over. But being in the most happy place in the world, to some, made the sudden happy outburst oddly normal and they just smiled and went about their business. Kelsey threw herself at you and hung around your neck, planting a long overdue and strangely well practiced kiss on your lips. A normal kiss from a succubus was deep enough, not to mention one on the lips, like she was doing. It had the power to do many powerful things to many creatures, specifically humans. But this was like she overflowed everything she was feeling in her emotions of the last few years into the kiss, actually making you blush heavily for a moment. She must’ve known that kissing wasn’t your expertise. In fact, she was now your first in this fashion. Feeding, you were well versed, kissing… not so much. So she unlocked her lips from yours and looked deep into your eyes. “Took you long enough…”
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: She wants you to allow her to not be tied down ...

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
You were slightly nervous about spreading that you were now in a romantic relationship with Kelsey. It also turned out that Mrs. Dremer was right, Kelsey was completely ok with the whole looking for a mate thing. You both decided that you would constantly look for a husband for her. You talked at length about different things. In the end, your relationship would be official but not exclusive. You both had enough feelings for each other to not cheat on the other. But the definition of ‘cheating’ was different for you both. As a Vampire, she understood what that entitled and would give you enough slack as far as feeding and like activities. Likewise, you knew that her being a Succubus would require her to do many things, kissing and having sex with other people included, not to mention finding a husband that she would love more than you.

In the end, you understood each other and more had a relationship that would last despite what each other’s race had each of you do. She greatly liked the idea of having a Vampire protector for her future children. That was something that not many people in history had. As for your families, her side was overjoyed at the news. Being intimately involved with a vampire was a definite leg up. But your family was a bit concerned. Then again, they had no idea what a relationship between a Vampire that sucks people’s blood and a Succubus that is designed to please humans sensually and sexually would be like. To be fair, neither did the two of you. However, they were happy for you none the less, and they already knew Kelsey as a part of the family anyway, similar to Eve. On that topic, Eve grilled Kelsey, being overprotective and all that. It was a strange sight to see the giant spider and the Succubus that were deep friends with each other go at it. But in the end they came to some kind of girl understanding… that you had no desire to understand. You were having a hard enough time with this new relationship thing to try and understand how women did this kind of thing with each other.

“Not fair man!” Colin exclaimed as you and Kelsey told your human friends at school the news.

“Why not?” Kelsey asked with a planted pouting face that melted him a little.

“You are… like the hottest person… ever. That means I can’t flirt with you anymore!” He broke out. It was true, while he was a guy and one that was leagues better than a majority of your other classmates, he did have a tendency to flirt and ‘play’ the field a bit.

“Dude, I think you seriously scored…!” Tou replied as he gave you a fist pound gesture, which you met with a smile.

“Like you had a chance with her anyway…” Dani teased. Unlike Colin, Dani wasn’t really interested in a relationship at the moment. Though he still blushed every once in a while at something Kelsey did, he was a bit more shy and standoffish about it. He would mainly tease Colin about his flirting attempts.

“Oh Colin… you can still flirt with me if you want…!” Kelsey said in a gentle tone. It may have sounded like a mock suggestion, but you knew she was serious. It was really a small boon that she could give him if it was really that important to him. She was a Succubus after all, allowing some flirting was by far the smallest sensual exercise that she partook in.

“No way! Now that you’re Caleb’s girl, I can’t. I may be a playa, but I’m not like that!” He said in a slightly serious tone. “He’s my boy, there’s no messing with his girl.”

“Well aren’t you sweet!” Kelsey exclaimed in a genuine smile. There were odd instances where she would be impressed by the actions of humans, and you could tell that this was one of them. Then again, she was still a High School student so… emotions and sentiments like that went a good distance with her. The comment however made Colin blush and look away.

The bell rung at that point and you all started to your classes. Now it was just you and Kelsey walking to class. There was rules against PDA in school, but most ignored it. You, however, wanted to obey the rules. So the most intimate things that the two of you did on school grounds was hold hands and hug. A light peck on the cheek at a game would be ok, but nothing that would be construed as disrespectful by the adults. A fact that Mrs. Dremer appreciated.

“So… Why’d it take you so long?” Kelsey asked as you both walked to class.

“Well, as I’ve said before, part of it was my cluelessness. But…” You started then thought before continuing. “… I guess I was just figuring that you could have anyone in the world, so why pick someone like me?”

“Someone like you????” She asked, confused.

“Well, I guess I’ve never really had a high opinion of myself. I never thought that I would be someone that a girl would like. Then I became a Vampire and the issue of having kids came the front and put me down further. So, when I looked at you, someone that needs to have as many kids as possible…” You said, then trailed off, not really wanting to finish the sentence.

“Caleb, you are the Vampire. Anyone in the world would die to just get to meet you, some quite literally. Kids or not, you are definitely worth it!” She said strictly, but also with an aura of kindness. She didn’t want to sound like she was scolding you. “We both know that I will have to have kids with someone else some day. And my mind will put them and my future husband above you. That is just the way it is. But do know, that the way I feel for you won’t die. As long as I am around, I will always feel love for you. You know that right?”

“I do… I just never thought that before.” You said then looked her in the eye. “I am eternally grateful that you do, and I love you as well. Now, more than just a sister, but never less than that.”


“Good!!!” She stated happily. “Now, there is a whole school of jealous kids we have to entertain!”
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: You let her know right away.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“A what?” You asked as King talked with you.

“A MYTHICAL MEETING” he repeated. Regardless of how small he made his voice, there was just no raining in a Amarok’s voice that was this powerful.

“What is that? And why do I have to go?” You asked. It was almost the end of the school year and you were focusing more so on the next realm you were going to as well as your new and developing relationship with Kelsey.

“It is the general conference that is held every 50 years…” Started a Kitsune that was to King’s side. “… it is a time that ALL the mythical creatures that want to have a say in the laws of mythical creatures to have a say. From where we can live to dominating the earth and eating humans, all laws are determined there.”

“Eating humans…?” You asked.

“Yes, most mythical beings feed off of humans for something. You drink their blood, Succubus feed off their sexual desire, Werewolves and mermaids off their flesh, and the list goes on. In the case of feeding on humans, a law is made for each race, since each has a different way of interacting with humans.” The Kitsune replied.

“I guess that makes sense. But what is my involvement? You said that it is VERY important that I come in particular???” You asked.

“INDEED!” King replied.

“You see, the first conference was established by one of the first Vampires. As your power is overall stronger than any of the other species, it is crucial that you know and understand all the laws. If something happens between races you need to know how to respond to it. While you are more or less above the law, you are also looked to as a solution in conflict between groups. That, and the moral of those there is always heightened when the Vampire of that age is present.” The Kitsune explained.

“So, how do I get there?” You asked, just excepting the fact that it would be best if you went.

“You must be shown the way. Your… predecessors made it VERY difficult to enter this place. Making sure that those that aren’t welcome can enter, either by accident or in attempt to sabotage.” The Kitsune started, took a breath then continued. “Most races are afforded only one human servant to do their bidding while there. You could enter as a race’s human. That is if you want to observe the conference hidden, at first. Otherwise you would be announced upon arrival and be swarmed by people trying to sway your opinions of their races. This way, you can see what they are like before all the butt kissing starts. As you have seen with the mages, they are not always what they appear on the outside.”

“That reminds me, is the mages coming to this thing?” You asked

“Yes… although, you could ban them if you want. But, to be fair, you’ve only met one family of mages. There are many more, and more powerful mages out there. Like the ones at Disney. I’ve heard that you enjoyed magic while there, correct?” Brad said as he entered, taking the other Kistune’s place, the other bowing as he took his leave.

“I guess I did, I still don’t like the Kohlers very well.” You replied. It was true, you wore the ring that Dumbledore had given you, and was actually contemplating going to the Harry Potter realm on your next Summer Vacation. But the Kohlers had a bad taste in your mouth. “So, there are families or nobility among the mages that I can contact about them?”

“Indeed, you can meet many of them at this conference. It will be quite obvious when we all take our seats to start the main law making section, as only the leaders of each individual race is allowed a seat at the table, sort of speak.” Brad explained.

“Ok, I guess going to this thing wouldn’t be a bad idea. Who am I going with?” You asked.

“Well, that is up to you. As much as we would like you to come with us… if you want to stay hidden until the law making section, then I would recommend not coming with us. Traditionally, there is only one that we would escort to the conference, that would be Lady Issibelle. So, that would be like putting a huge neon sign above you that says that you are the new Vampire. I would suggest either the Succubus race, Kelsey in particular, or Eve… as no one would suspect you to be coming with her… most don’t know who you are, much more that you are friends with her. Spiders usually keep to themselves….” Brad explained.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: The Mythical Meeting

choices: You go to your spot right away.
You wait to sit for a while.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“Well, this is… new.” You said as you entered the Mythical conference.

You had been prepared for there being a good amount of species and their one allotted human, but there were literally thousands, perhaps hundreds of thousands of species and people there. You saw everything from giants, orcs, other spider queens, and other very not humanoid creatures to the President of the United States.

“What did you expect?” Kelsey asked as she walked with you. You had contemplated going with Eve, but with Kelsey you would be able to walk with her, not behind her like a slave. “The attendance will be even higher this year.

“Why’s that?” You asked

“Because of you, of course. You are a big deal you know? People keep track best they can when a new Vampire will be among them. They want to know who you are, to either kiss your butt or steer clear of you if they are doing something that… is less than legal by our standards.” Kelsey explained as her Mother knew she couldn’t give you too much recognition, yet, so she just pat you on the shoulder and went to socialize with other Succubus looking people. Also unlike normal, everyone was in their real forms. Suppose there was no use hiding here, except you at the moment. “Let’s go explore a bit. And… I’m sorry if I have to be demeaning or offensive in front of others until you reveal yourself. I don’t want to upset some giant or Mermaid and have them take you out of spite.”

“I got it, want me all to yourself do you?” You joked to which she nudged you playfully, her tail wrapping around you a little, then you two were off.

The place was in and under the ocean so that the water type monsters could come, but it was also like a gigantic covered stadium that would probably house a few states if needed. Unlike your normal preference, magic was the way to get here and you didn’t overly mind. It still made your skin crawl a little bit though and as soon as you got there you put your glyph on a few things to make it so you didn’t have to do it that way again. Most of them nodded at Kelsey and at best overlooked you.

“Why is the President here?” You asked.

“Well usually a representative for the U.N. comes to these things so they can advise the world leaders on what we’ve decided. They really don’t have any power here. Most of the time no human leader wants to be here, surrounded by so many creatures that can at best eat or seduce them. So it looks like he drew the short straw, or however they decide such things.” Kelsey answered as they walked and noticed how uncomfortable he was, especially since he was all alone and wasn’t permitted even another human for defense, since he was his human.

“Caleb???” Came a voice that you knew all too well. You both turned as Matt Malcame came over. He was as large as usual. Considering his wrestling carrier you always wondered where he got so strong, for a human at least. He saw Kelsey, recognized her, then saw her other features that said more than enough to divert his eyes downward in respect. “Ma’am…”

“Caleb, find me when you are done socializing.” Kelsey said in a authoritative tone, she was good at acting and she was able to pull this off beautifully. You nodded and bowed a little to which she turned and walked away, you could feel the smirk and snicker she had at your two’s little show.

“Hey Matt.” You greeted with a smile.

“Hey… So you here with Kelsey huh? Makes sense I guess. Always wondered why you two were so close in school.” Matt replied.

“Yeah, you could say that. Who are you with?” You asked.

“My family are in service to some trolls. They are… alright I guess, don’t think much of us lowly humans though.” He said as he nodded over to some large 30 foot tall trolls. Each had a human with them, one of them was in the middle of taking a long lick of one of them, leaving their drool on the poor girl, then setting her half hazardly on the ground. You recognized her as Matt’s younger Sister. You could feel his blood boil a little, but he seemed good at hiding it as his composer didn’t change at all.

“Looks like they have an appetite for humans though…” You noticed out loud.

“They keep it in check. They generally don’t kill or eat my family as long as we are of use. They got rules that they can only eat their servants or criminals that are on death row. If you’ve heard of those inmates that are that way and secretly put to death, they are some that are sent to my Masters.” Matt explained.

“Do you get… tasted as well?” You asked.

“Naturally. We are chosen by a member of their family, usually at a young age. While I still must obey any of them, my direct Master is one of the head family daughters. In human form she goes to our school as a 7th grader now. But… yeah, she likes to lick me clean after working out and stuff… ‘clean’ being a very loose term.” Matt replied as he nodded over to a shorter (about 20 feet tall) troll with longer black hair. There were many types of trolls in the group and you were at least a bit satisfied that the one he was paired with was more attractive troll wise than some of the other drooling messes that were around. She almost looked human, if not for the multiple sets of fangs, sharp teeth, hard skin, obvious height, and slightly overdeveloped muscle structure. You saw a long tongue come from her mouth to lick some residual drool from her lips and fangs. Unlike most of her kind she seemed attentive to how she looked.

“HUMAN!!! Get your useless ass over here!” Ordered the troll in question as she looked over and saw you two talking. You almost missed it but you bowed at her gaze as Matt hurried over. She seemed pleased by your reaction and shoved Matt to a place by her side, holding him there with her a hand that was putting a good deal of pressure on him as evidence to the slightly strained face and the obvious stress on his muscles.

“Keep your eyes off my daughter, meat!” Growled another troll as an impact hit your body and flung you a few feet across the floor. You thought about rebounding like you normally did against people like him. But you were trying hard to pass as a believable human. So you let your body thud against the ground in a way that sounded bad but no bones would break on a normal human. The Troll just growled at you as others nodded and laughed at the situation, at you in particular.

You kept your eye downcast as others pushed you around while you made your way back to Kelsey.

"There you are, human." Kelsey said with a superior tone, then clung into your neck as if kissing it like she would do to play with a human. But she did it to get near your ear. "What happened to you?"

"Got to meet the trolls and a few others. Not a fan at the moment." You replied.

"Well, most of us put up a show like we are doing. Just give it a bit of time, but remember it. I think it will be a big piece of humble pie when they realize they were pushing YOU around like that." Kelsey said than distanced herself a little and led you around.

You kept your vision downcast as she socialized with people. To this most made fun of you or still pushed you around. Kelsey played it off and told them that she was the only one allowed to push you around, to which they honored her request. You met mermaids, who were snacking on some human limbs. Your predatory instinct wanted to join, while your mind was repulsed, even more so when they almost pulled you in to join them. You could feel an attractant let loose at you, but you pretended to be too entranced by Kelsey to be overdone by theirs.

The only time you broke you cover, was when you saw the Kohlers walk around. Most of the monsters gave them a wide birth. Apparently, even if they weren't the highest in the mage system, they were up there a bit. You glanced up and locked eyes with both Beth and her Father for a flicker of a second. Your deathly glare told them all they needed that you were being treated as a human for a reason and they had best walk on egg shells around you.

Finally, the meeting was about to start and Kelsey led you into the room. Just like outside, it was like a stadium, housing all kinds of creatures. But this time they had their own spots and a section of chairs that showcased the prominent heads of their people. You saw the President take a seat in his chair, King sat in his spot, right next to a chair with a clear purpose of you being in it. Likewise, each seat seemed to scream for the person it belonged to, as if there couldn't be anyone else to sit in them. This was going to be interesting.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Go with Kelsey

choices: You take part in making the laws.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
People started filing into the stadium, the big wigs of each species in the seats in the center… which was sizable as it held hundreds of thousands of predators and most just a tad bigger than a human. Above the center there was an observation area that was used for those not partaking in the main decision making process but want to observe. Like Kelsey said, this one would be one that they all wanted to witness, to see you. Of course, they all had their human slaves, that as a side effect of serving their masters, got a front row seat to this event.

“How long are you going to wait to take YOUR seat?” Kelsey asked as you stood beside her and her Mother, both wanting to know your answer.

“Eventually. I don’t want too much commotion… yet… not because of me anyway.” You said than noticed a species on the other side of your seat. Considering that King was insanely powerful and at the seat’s left, you wondered what your relation was with the species that was on the right. You looked at them and it was both hard to believe and mistake what they were… dragons. “What is their deal?”

“You mean the dragons?” Mrs. Dremer asked, this time she knew that Kelsey didn’t know what she was talking about with this question.

“Yes.” You answered simply. You took stock to what they looked like. You had seen pictures of different types of dragons in fantasy sites and whatnot. These ones at least stood on all fours and were just as large as King. That was the main difference, while King was impressive, even next to the Dragons, there was only one of him and his mate at his size… Almost all the dragons were his size. It was clear that they were a species that was not to be taken lightly. As if to agree, your genetic knowledge put in a healthy amount of respect for them. However, unlike the feeling you originally got from King, there was a complete peace with them, as if they posed no threat.

“Dragons have been the servants and friends of the age’s Vampire since… well as far back as anyone can remember or find in history. They are by far the strongest predator here, other than you, and number enough to probably topple nations if so directed. To top it off, like the Reapers, they are immune to magic. But unlike them, they are almost more proficient with magic than the mages are. Since, as you obviously know, Vampires are weak against magic, having a deathly loyal group like them is more than welcome. Trust me, even if they have magic, they are your strongest allies in the room, even over King.” Kelsey responded, slightly put off as she had to admit there was yet another species that were higher trust wise than her to you.

“It does seem like they would be good friends to have.” You said, wondering if dragons were that powerful, what your predecessors must have done to force or gain their everlasting loyalty. Or perhaps it was just a genetic thing, like King’s command to the K-9 world. Maybe they didn’t have a choice for some reason. Either way, dragons would be good people to know.

Soon, most if not all the seats were filled. Everyone seemed to be waiting for you to take your seat, even if most didn’t know who or what you were. They were all looking around, King looked at you a few times but tried to make it as subtle as possible, so others didn’t mass around you if they followed his gaze to find you. The Kohlers were avoiding both looking at you and your gaze, but they were all getting anxious to see you.

“It is time…” said the low voice of who seemed to be the head dragon. It would appear that he was the speaker for the event. Made sense you supposed. At least what you knew of dragons from books and movies. Even if they had their differences, one thing they all had in their presentation of dragons was their wisdom from living very long lives. “… if the new Vampire is present, please take your seat. If not, they the Mystical Meeting will begin at once.”

“I suppose that’s my cue. I really hope the butt kissing isn’t too painful.” You joked as you kissed Kelsey on the cheek and she smiled, pushing you along to the walk way in front of most of the platforms and seats, to which you followed directly to your seat.

You could immediately felt the gaze of every living thing in the place on you. It was an… uncomfortable feeling. You passed the trolls and Matt, giving him a mock salute as you went, amidst the gapping shocked expressions of many that had been less than polite to you beforehand, followed by an angered expression. If you weren’t the vampire and just a human trying to capitalize on the position, they looked forward to your demise. But if you were the Vampire, they would have to do some damage control.

You could also feel the gaze of the dragons, analyzing you very deeply to make sure you were who you said you were. Their gaze was very intimidating, so you switched to looking at King, who bowed to you then gestured to your seat. You walked up the stairs to your seat, between and just high enough to reach King’s and the main Dragon’s high neck area. A small glyph appeared on the small area in front of your seat, identical to the one at Disney, glowing red in reaction to you. The Dragons lightened their intensity when they saw this and you awkwardly sat in the seat.

“What are they all waiting for?” You asked King, you could tell the main dragon to the direct right of you was irritated that you addressed King and not him.

“Most of the time, the Vampire goes full power before we continue. All the Magic in one spot is like an all you can eat buffet for the Reapers. But once they sense your immense energy, they won’t be caught dead anywhere near this place. Keeps us safe.” King hinted.

“Do I have to…? People get hurt when I go full power.” You asked. Sure you had been practicing while playing football, like Luke had suggested. But you usually had to work up to a gentle flow of your full power. But you still didn’t have complete control over instantly raising you to full power. Kind of like cooking a frog. Boil slowly and they will just stick in there, but put them in boiling water and it can get rather interesting.

“Better hurt than dead.” King advised. His voice still, even in this barely whispering state, was low and rumbling, signifying the power behind it.

“Fine…” You sighed. You stood up and took a few steps to the end of the little platform in front of your seat that had the glyph on it.

You sighed again, again feeling all the eyes of all in attendance on you. The feeling brought you chills. You then increased to full power; first was your eyes and fangs then the other effects that tended to happen when you went full power. You began to float involuntarily as the power you were unleashing forced you up. The entire place creaked and sparked under the weight and influence of your power. Most of the humans around were forced to their knees by the weight of it, those that were too weak to catch themselves there were knocked out as their heads hit the ground. Fires erupted in a few places but you tried very hard to contain them and at the very least have them appear in places that were acceptable, like unlit torches and braziers. When you had hit full power and was able to calm the area, you floated back down to the platform. You looked at King, then at the Main Dragon, then addressed both of them who were both proud and wincing from being so close to your power.

“Good enough?” You asked.

“Yes, Master…” The main dragon announced.

“Good…” you started than dialed back your power and was normal shortly after. “… I don’t overly enjoy doing that at the moment. Makes everyone scared of me and in pain.”

You walked back to your seat and sat gently down, gazing out at the crowd that was recovering. Most of the humans were either unconscious and drooling or pain ridden as they tried standing to their master’s commands. Most of the predators were stretching their limbs, avoiding eye contact as best they could, or looking at you with fearful eyes. They now knew who you were, what you were, and what that meant as far as their position to you. There was no further question that you were THE VAMPIRE. You glanced over at Kelsey and Mrs. Dremer, who both were panting but giving you a smile. You had to expect that they were proud of you, likewise when you looked over at Eve and Drade, and finally you glanced at Kings head to find a favorable gaze.

“Now what?” You asked.

“Now, the Mythical Meeting begins!” The main Dragon announced.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: You go to your spot right away.

choices: The first Dragon and first Vampire were family.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
Most of the meeting was lists of laws for each species of predator. You were glad that each species had a rule on the consumption of humans, and all had a level of avoiding innocence as a food source. Down part was that EVERY species had to repeat each law, then the whole community had to vote on any changes that were to be made. Most had to do with asserting themselves over others, which was quickly squashed by a negative vote. The only change that was accepted was an additional limit on the number of humans allowed to be eaten by the Mermaids. Instead they were to help humans drowning when they could, but only after they were drowned to the point of unconsciousness, in order to keep their existence a secret. However, they did have an allotted conditions where eating the humans in the water were ok.

It was slightly uncomfortable, for you and most of the humans, when the subject of eating humans came up. President Owen was particularly put off, but didn’t dare interject on such points, no doubt in fear of becoming one of those meals they were talking about. Other laws were things that involved using their knowledge to help or hurt mankind. You hadn’t thought about it before, but you supposed that giving humans access to a species’ secrets could be a bad thing if it offset the balance of power in the world. Like if one country learned all the magic that dragons or mages had, or if the Navy of a particular country were helped by giant mermaids.

However, after 3 days of straight law making, the meeting was over. Most Predators had a tolerance to staying awake longer than humans, but all in attendance were exhausted and went to their allotted quarters. Only you and a few other species had a fully awake mind.

“Master?” The Main Dragon inquired.

“Yes Draco?” You asked. Ironically enough, whomever the head dragon of their kind was adapted that name. It was like a status thing and all other dragons were forbidden to have that name unless they were the leader. It helped with clarification a bit. “… and please, it’s just Caleb. I don’t think I’ll be ready for the whole “Master” title for a while.”

“As you wish.” He said with a bow, then continued. “Will you permit me to speak with you in private?”

“Sure, as long as it doesn’t take too abnormally long. There are a few people I’d like to catch before they leave.” You answered then turned to King, who was dutifully sitting by you. It was his voice that said some of your concerns during the meeting, when appropriate. He would sometimes tell you when something was a little too far, as you had yet to learn the ropes just yet. “See you Later King. Thanks for the help.”

“Of Course.” King responded with a bow, then turned and headed off for a nap of his own in his chamber, like all had pretty much done.

“So, where to?” You asked Draco.

“If you would indulge me, I would hide you until we are in my quarters? I don’t want other races to bombard while we speak.” Draco asked.

“Ok… sure. Why do I feel like this is going to get awkward?” You asked rhetorically as he turned his large head and opened his jaws in front of you. “Yep, that would be why.”

You sighed as his jaws remained open for you to enter. You didn’t want to cause a scene, as the point of this was to get to the designation without drawing attention. So you quickly jumped in his jaws and they sealed behind you. You could feel him moving around, growling at times, and his tongue underneath you adjusting and at times it felt like it was tasting you, but not so much as to be obvious. He probably didn’t want to offend you, his new master, in any way. You looked around and saw some saliva pool, then expertly deposited into the throat, some dripped from the roof of his mouth and down his massive teeth. You could feel and see a glow from the throat, that you assumed was some kind of fire lung or something, as it glowed a fire like glow from somewhere beyond. You waited until he opened his jaws again to a platform and you took this as his invitation to exit. You did so and was greeted by an almost empty room, other than the two of you.

“Thank you for trusting me.” Draco said.

“Trusting you?” You asked, unclear on why stepping into his jaws warranted that. If push came to shove, and he decided to really eat you, you could always bust out of him the hard way.

“We Dragons are highly magical creatures. NOTHING, not even you, could thwart us if we truly decided to do something, like eating you. That, and I’ve heard of your aversion to magic. Almost slaughtered the Kohler family for what they did to you and your family when I heard. So, for trusting a highly dangerous and magical being like myself, I thank you.” Draco clarified.

“Uh… no sweat…” you answered, slightly embarrassed that you didn’t think of that first, and now a little cautious about them. If they really were near your power level and could kill you, then the likelihood of protecting anyone from them wasn’t very high. You still wondered how the Vampires before you had been able to secure such a tight alliance and supremacy with them.

“I understand that this new information is quite… upsetting. So, let me bring things down more to your level, or size as it is.” Draco offered, then flapped his wings once, by their second swing, he was human and the wings disappeared into his back. You tilted your head, a little confused but also intrigued. You had never seen him before, but there was also an aura of familiarity with him. “Master?”

“I told you, Caleb, please.” You corrected, to which he smiled and nodded. “I… have lots of questions, but I guess I can pick your brain at a later date, as it will probably take loads of time to explain.”

“That is a fair assessment.” He agreed.

“I guess, one that is bugging me at the moment is… Why such a powerful group like yourself would subject yourselves to me. From what I can sense and perceive, you are probably more powerful than I am, could kill and eat me if you wanted.” You stated and asked.

“Hold on, Caleb. I think you are misunderstanding me. When I said that that you couldn’t stop us, I meant US as a species. A few of us, working together could subdue you, mainly due to our mastery of magic. On top of that, our bodies are resistant to magic, making us the true masters of it, even over mages. But, just like the rest of them, your full power negates our power and puts you on top. As you can figure, we’d probably wait until you tired yourself out, then attack. That is assuming that we want to attack you, which we will NEVER do. I’m sorry if I scared you.” Draco quickly explained.

“It’s ok. I just get a little scared if there is something out there that I can’t protect those I care for against.” You explained back.

“Caleb… Master… You or any you designate NEVER have to fear us. We will always be there for you, wither you deserve it or not, and wither we like it or not.” Draco said with a very serious and also sad face.

“But why?” You asked.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: After the meeting...

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“You ever wonder why, out of all the things you could do, magic is and forever will be out of your reach?” Draco asked.

“Yes, obviously.” You responded.

“And yet, going full power makes you completely immune to magic. Without any affinity for magic, how can you have so much power over it?” Draco asked.

“Another good question I don’t have the answer to.” You answered.

“You see, the first Vampire, he had no such troubles. He was unparalleled with magic, strongest in the world in fact. His secrets, handed down, are why all others have magic today. But there was one major problem to having that much MAGICAL power.” Draco explained.

“Reapers?” You asked.

“Exactly! You see, the reapers, at that time, were the darkest and most feared force in the world. They ate and sucked dry any and all they wanted. No one could stop them. The only one with a prayer of doing so was the first Vampire. But every time he attacked them, he was overwhelmed by their numbers. As you know, they swarm any magic to suck it dry. Him fighting was the richest source they had every seen. Eventually they would trap him by attacking villages and his family, when he defended them the reapers closed in. They would suck him almost completely dry, then let him recharge, then repeat. In that age, he was known as ‘The Sacred One’. But things couldn’t stay the way they were.” Draco explained.

“So what did the first Vampire do to change things?” You asked, very interested.

“He split himself into two separate beings. Most of himself he kept in his traditional form, all of his Vampire power and countless supporting abilities. However, anything that didn’t compliment those abilities, thus hindering him from fighting the Reapers, were put into the second species, with a little bit of Vampire power so they could do damage to Reapers, but not the way he could. That is where the Dragons came from. We are, in a sense, your other half. The species has grown and now is very impossible to bring together the two halves, but the fact remains, you are our master, because we are a part of you. Just as your leg has no desire or ability to harm you on its own, neither do we. Do you understand?” Draco asked.

“I… I… I think so…” You answered. You had felt that there was a connection between you two. But you hadn’t thought it was something this… connected. It made sense why they were slightly weaker but overall pretty close to you power wise, and why they would NEVER betray you and would want the same as you. They, after all, were you, in a sense. Any morals you had would be transferred to them to a certain degree. They obviously had their own minds, but you apparently had your influence to them without even trying. You shook your head and decided to dive into this later, when you had time. “What happened to the offending Reapers?”

“He slaughtered them and took away a good amount of their ability to breed. For every 5000 Reapers that are born, only one survives. He left them alive to police the use of magic, but they are a vapor of what they were when they terrorized this world so heavily. The whole of existence owes him, and you in connection, everything. One of many reasons why you are so revered. Many fear that if you were to actually pass from this world, the Vampire that is, that the Reapers would rise again and be able to breed in excess. Many think that when God takes you from this world, it will be the end times. No matter what their beliefs, you are the most powerful, most feared, most revered, most respected, and most protected person on this planet. No one will oppose you.” Draco answered, finishing the short version of the story. You had no doubt that you would hear the full version later. But for now, you were satisfied.


“Thanks for clearing things up a bit. I gotta go talk to some people, but do you mind sending someone over to my family’s home so I can get to know the dragons some more?” You asked. You still needed some time to process things. Some time doing other things to get your mind off of it and allow you to process it later, at ease, would help. But you definitely wanted to know things about them. Who wouldn’t want to hang with and talk with dragons?

“Now that I know who you are, I will be more than happy to come by. I suspect that many will relocate to your area, to be near you. I know that you probably didn’t want all the fame, but it looks like you got it now…” Draco said.

“I suppose so. Thanks!” You replied back.

“No, Thank YOU. If you need anything, and I do mean ANYTHING, let me know. Consider me your magical arm, if you will?” He asked.

“I prefer not.” You answered, drawing a confused and hurt expression. “I would prefer friend.”

“I… I think I would like that.” He stammered out. He wiped away a tear before it could be overly noticed.

With that you took your leave. With a few dragons roaming around and guarding the door, there weren’t a lot of people around. And because of the way you were transported there, no one was around to see you. So now it was up to you where to go.

So, where to?
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: They are part of you.

choices: The President wants to be friends
The President wants a strictly buisness relationship.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
You thought about it as you walked, trying to avoid the crowds of predators and humans. Anyone you did pass bowed to you, and at times made a fuss when you told them to stand up and NOT make a scene. You figured that there was one person on your list that you would have a hard time seeing again, and would like nothing more than to leave this place as soon as he could. So, you went in his direction. Eventually you made it in front of a door that was crowded with taunting predators, growling and doing their best to put off the human in the room, the President of the United States of America, your country. You felt like telling them to get lost, but you had a better idea. You turned to mist and entered the president’s room. He was in a chair, gripping the sides of it heavily. He would flinch at every noise and threat from outside, shaking all the while. He tried to relieve the stress and whatnot by getting up and pacing, but no matter what the predators said or how they said it, he obviously did NOT plan on letting them in. He would, at times sit back in the chair and take only sips of an expensive smelling drink. You didn’t know much about alcohol, but the label said ‘Scotch’. You brought yourself together on a chair facing him. He was a little out of sorts, so you waited until he put down his drink before speaking.

“I shouldn’t have come. Now that I know who and what they are, they will follow me and my family forever, until I die. The kinds of things they can do, and eat, I’ll never sleep good for the rest of my life. Waiting for something to swallow me down or tare my family apart.” He said to himself.

“No worries, I won’t let that happen.” You replied, making him freeze, then slowly raise his previously downward looking face to yours. As his eyes locked on yours he became rigid and braced against his chair. You figured that no matter what you said, he would not calm down. So you kept it simple. “Hi, Mr. President, it is an honor to meet you. I…”

You were going to continue when a particularly loud and hard slam hit the metal door, bending it.

“Human… come out and play… I only want to bite off your arm, maybe a foot, or…” The voice from the other side of the door said.

“Excuse me for a second.” You said, glowing your eyes in irritation. He just nodded dumbly and watched as you got up from the chair and headed to the door, to which there was still a good amount of noise and banging residing.

“If you don’t open up and talk with me, I can always persuade it to…” the voice continued, to which you unlatched the door and opened it to interrupt him. You were greeted by a loud group of about 15 predators, the big one that put the dent in the door and was in the middle of his taunt was some kind of lizard creature, but a little larger than a troll. Their faces went from joy and leering humor to dread and fear at the sight of you.

“Well, you must have something insanely important to say if you are so… insistent on it. Please, enlighten me on the topic that you found so invaluably important.” You said to the stunned group.

They didn’t know what to do in their shock. The lizard creature had been drooling and making his presence as unattractively hungry as possible. No doubt to put the President off further. Now with his shock, his drool was piling on the floor. You looked down at the approaching pool of drool and mucus as it touched your shoes. You made it boil then evaporate then looked back up at creature.

“Uh… I… Uh…” he started, but for the life of him he couldn’t come up with anything to say. Ironic, because if you were in a foul mood, for all they knew, his life DID hang in the balance.

“Beat it.” You interupted with a glare.

He or they didn’t have to be told twice. They almost trampled over each other to do exactly what you told them to do. You then shut the door, pushed the dent in the door back into place with no effort, then sat back down in the chair you had started in.

“Sorry about that.” You apologized, your eyes back to normal and trying to put out as much of a good aura as you could. You thought about calming him down yourself, but decided against it. Like so many others, you wanted him to react to you their own way, not a fake way. You were patient and sat there for a bit. He took another sip of his drink, but didn’t start talking, probably not sure what to say. “I would think, from what you just went through, that you’d be on your second bottle by this point.”

“And pass out, by myself, in the middle of this place, with everything and everyone wanting to eat me… I don’t think so.” He said, breaking his silence. He turned red, realizing that he just mouthed off to probably the most powerful person here.

“Yeah, I suppose you are right about that!” You laughed out. He seemed confused but a little more at ease when you laughed. As if it was a more light conversation. Just shooting the wind sort of speak.

“So, what did you want to see me for?” The President was able to bring up. He had obviously seen what you could do to some extent. Why such a powerful individual wanted to talk to him was beyond him. Here, he was only a human. Not like any of the things around him at the moment, certainly not like the insanely powerful Vampire that was in front of him right now.

“Well, you looked a bit uncomfortable and picked on by those around. I… just became the Vampire in the last decade, so I am still very much used to what it is like to be a human, not to mention my still living and loving human family. So, suffice to say, helping you out, if I can, is something I like to do. Plus, I wanted to touch base with you eventually anyway. I figured talking with you now would be better than appearing in the Oval Office or something like that, wouldn’t you agree?” You explained and asked.

“I… Yes, I suppose so. But what is it you wanted to ‘touch base’ on?” He asked, still tuned to why you of all people wanted to meet with him.

“Oh, just the normal stuff really, and perhaps a little influence.” You started, then saw him get a little bit defensive. You continued before his mind could make too many assumptions. “By that I mean, if I have to do something, mostly predator related, and I’m stopped by some of your people, it would be helpful if I could just give you a call to get them to back off.”

“Example being?” He asked.

“Well… if I was trying to get into a restricted area to deal with… a dragon perhaps, that is being unruly, or a few mages, or some Reapers… and I have to go through some military or federal personnel, I think you would prefer me dealing with it rather than them coming after you… unless you have some kind of measure in place for such things?” You explained and asked.

“I do, but from what I saw of you today, you could do much better. I see what you mean. I suppose, having a working relationship with you would simplify matters. Perhaps I could even call on you from time to time.” He rattled off, again, before thinking, to which he froze at his forwardness.

“Well, I can do favors for you, if I feel like it. But I think you should understand something. While I like helping out my friends and family, human problems, like wars and such things that you would find me useful on, are just that… HUMAN concerns. Sure, you could ask if I could help out every once in a while, and I could offer, but I am in no way obligated to do as you ask or say.” You answered.

“Of course, forgive my forwardness.” He said, straightening a bit. He had to remember, even though you looked like a kid, you were a Vampire. A Vampire that pretty much had control over almost every predator in the world. He had to handle this with care.

“No worries. I don’t want to threaten you Mr. President. My Parents always raised me to respect authority. I just needed you to understand things. If I can have my way, I prefer a friendship over slaves of sorts. If you don’t want anything to do with me, that is up to you. However, I would definitely like having a friend like you…
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: Go visit the President.

1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
You waited patiently while the President was deep in thought. You could see, even without reading his mind, that he was heavily debating this. On the one hand, you would be a wonderful ally to have. Now that he knew that you were a citizen of the United States, he could hopefully count on you to keep the peace better than if you lived elsewhere. But openly consorting to a being as powerful as you, bowing to requests, asking for favors, seemed a lot like negotiating with terrorists. But you were civil… for now. Finally, it seemed like he had made up his mind.

“I accept your offer.” He said, standing to be more formal, to which you followed his example and stood to meet him.

“Y-you do?” You asked. Putting out there that he had to explain a little bit on what he meant.

“Yes. I will accept your friendship, and understand that there are things you will say no to, and things that you are not free or willing to share with me. I assume that politics would be something that you have no interest in helping with?” He asked.

“That is correct, Sir.” You answered with a smile. He had obviously noticed that you were the type of person NOT to overly enjoy politics or being part of them.

“Well then, I should greet you more formally and casually. Hello Mr…?” He asked.

“Caleb Konel.” You answered.

“Yes. Hello, Caleb. I am George Haize, President of the United States of America. Wonderful to meet you!” He said with his hand out to shake yours.

“Hello, Mr. President. I am Caleb Konel, Vampire of this world. An honor to meet your Sir!” You replied back, shaking his hand gently (for you).

You two smiled at each other, then sat back down and continued to talk for a while on random things. He was very interested about you, naturally…

After a while you got out of there and headed for another person you wanted to see. You knew a few of the predator factions, and they all would see you later. However, there was one person connected with the predators that didn’t know what you were, until you revealed yourself. A friend. Matt. You had seen his and the troll’s faces when you revealed yourself, it was priceless. Soon you stood in front of a door to where you smelled Matt’s scent. You made sure no one was there. He was alone, for the most part. He was in a corner of the room, apparently waiting to be instructed, while the female troll took a shower. You entered the room and made your way behind him. He seemed nervous and you could see a few new bruises, probably from the young troll for some reason or another.

“How in the world are you still awake?” You asked, causing his body to shiver and shake. He had obviously been thinking about you and how high up on the predator authority latter you were. You moved to an area that he could see, but he just declined his eye line and bowed further to you. “That had to be the longest and most boring thing I’ve ever been to.”

“Yes sir…” He stated with some fear in his voice.

“No need for that Matt. Please sit up and in that chair.” You requested gently.

He hesitated, then did exactly what you asked. A posture that he obviously didn’t get to do when serving his Master. Now it made sense why he enjoyed class so much, for an obviously dominate athlete. It was one of the only instances that he got to enjoy something as simple as sitting normally. He still wasn’t making eye contact, but at least he was a bit more comfortable. Not comfortable enough however to initiate a conversation.

“You know, I didn’t tell people what I am because I didn’t want them to treat me different. I really don’t want you to fear me like that. For starters, as they said, I am the NEW Vampire. I still value my human relationships greatly, yours included. Please, relax, I promise not to snap off your head or something like that.” You added, trying to make him, again without your attractants and mind abilities, to relax. But, unlike the president, he probably grew up a slave of the predators, and that was a lot of living a certain way to override.

“H-how long, Sir?” He asked.

“First off, it’s just Caleb, please. Second, it’s only been a few years. So yes, when I met you in wrestling, I was a vampire. More of a baby Vampire, per say, but vampire none the less.” You answered.

“So I was…” He started, obviously scared at the implications of some of his wrestling exploits at your expense.

“Matt? Do you really think, as a Vampire, you did anything to me that I didn’t allow?” You asked. He thought about it, flicked his eye line to meet yours, then adverted it again in thought. “I joined wrestling and football out of fun. You were one of very few people to give me a challenge at a human level. I enjoyed it greatly.”

“You… enjoyed it?” He asked. With more of a comical tone than he probably meant to. As much as his growing up with predators had given him a certain way to act around them, he still knew you from school and had a habit of joking around with you. He realized his partial blunder, one that probably would’ve gotten him a beating by his masters and started to sweat and bow before he heard you chuckle a bit.

“In a matter of speaking. My late Father encouraged me in it, so wrestling is something that is special to me. Having fun doing it makes it enjoyable to me… not as much as making out with Kelsey, but I suppose that makes more sense to you now as well, and why she’s so hot.” You replied, responding slightly to comments he had been giving you about her. She was, by far, the ‘hottest’ girl in school. Then again, judging humans to the standard of a Succubus was hardly fair.

“Yes… uh… Caleb… I definitely see that now.” He said, having a hard time remembering your instruction, fighting his habits, and staying awake. You saw his eyes droop for a second, only to flick open and do the same. It was slight, barely noticeable, probably practice from years of hiding his fatigue from his masters.

“Which brings me back to my original question. How are you still awake? That was tiring even for me. I’d think you would be catching some Zs by this point…?” You asked. You already knew the answer, but wanted to establish some conversation points that were a bit lighter than you being, to him, an all powerful Vampire.

“I have My Master to assist before I can sleep.” He informed as formally as he could.

“Human!” came a call as an approaching presence made her way out of the bathroom.

As soon as she said this he got up and quickly made his way to his previous position. You thought about ordering him to stay comfortable, but decided you didn’t want to get him in trouble after you took your leave. He looked at the chair he was just sitting in with horror. He probably knew that if she found out he was relaxing without her permission, he’d be getting punished. You smiled and used some of your power to put the chairs back and take a spot leaning against the wall by him.

“Yes Ma’am.” Matt answered in an attentive tone.

“Dry me off. I just took a nice long shower and could go for…” She started as she walked into the room, completely naked accept for the towel she was holding and dabbing at her hair. As soon as she was within sightline she tossed her massive towel over to him, completely covering both of you, however she could see both of your silhouettes underneath. She stopped mid sentence at the sight of an unknown human sized person under the towel. “Human, I thought I told you before about what happens if one of your friends come around, especially the human ones…”

You could see but even Matt could hear her lick her fangs at the thought of a fresh human meal. You glared at her through the towel, something she didn’t see… yet. It wouldn’t be long though, as she was retrieving the towel to see her supposed prize.

“I suppose I won’t punish you for such a delightfully tasty smelling…” She started as she pulled the towel away.

Like most predators, she liked to toy with her prey. To that effect, she made a spectacle of ripping the towel off them and standing as sexily over them as possible, which would also invoke, in most, a deep sense of dread. Although, in this case, it was slightly comical to see her go from that pose to a dreaded pose of her own at the sight of you glaring at her, glowing red eyes showing. She stood there, frozen in fear. After all, from what she felt during the meeting, you could easily tear her apart, and she was very young. So her imagination to such an event was probably going overboard.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.title: The President wants to be friends

choices: Make friends with at least some of them.
Give them Magic back, but keep them on a VERY short leash.
1123112111111111121111121111111111111121.content:
“I believe the word you are searching for is ‘snack’. However, as a favor to Matt, I would very much NOT like to smash your teeth in for trying to take a bite out of me.” You informed, escalating the young trolls panic to the point where she was holding her breath. At this rate, she would be fainting pretty soon. “You have my permission to breathe now…”

This seemed to snap her out of her shock and she, very quickly for a young girl of her size, hopped over her bed and hid behind it. This was kind of cute, as even a predator like her was not beyond hiding behind her furniture from a threat, though it would do little good if you really intended to harm her.

“Human, defend.” She peeped out. Matt seamed to move on instinct and quickly got between you and his master, probably without thinking about it. It was obvious that this was something that he was trained to do in dangerous situations. He was tired enough to realize that his action might be unnecessary. He thought about it after doing it and facing you, giving you a look that said, ‘yeah, like this is going to work…’.

“Sorry about this bud.” You said, then flicked your wrist a little, gently moving him off the ground and out of the way. Unlike so many others you had done that to, you had no intention of harming him. So you just carefully restrained him against a wall. You could feel that he was feeling strange with a power he couldn’t even imagine restraining him. But being at the mercy of a predator was something he was strangely used to. You then turned your attention toward his Master. “If I was going to harm you, a human or a bed would not do much in stopping me.”

“P-Please… D-Don’t kill me…” she whimpered as she continued to hide behind the bed. You thought about disintegrating it to give you an unobstructed path to converse with her. However, it seemed that it was holding a majority of her sanity in check, so you left her to the pose she was in, for now.

“I don’t plan on killing you. I only stopped by to have a chat with my friend from school.” You informed. At first she was confused by your words, fairly certain that you two had never met. But then you looked at Matt, then back at her. She understood, sort of.

“My human… is your friend???” She asked, surprised that a predator at your level would have human friends.

“Indeed he is. I never shared with him what I really am. Now he knows, so I thought a nice chat, void of any B.S. concerning my status, would be nice. That was until you busted into the room and interrupted.” You informed and answered.

“I-I’m… S-Sorry…” She stuttered out. You could tell that she didn’t see a problem with treating humans like she was treating him. Sure, at school, she probably had human ‘friends’, but none with the significance that you were putting on HER servant. But for the sake of her own life, she apologized.

“In either case, he is way too tired to talk with, at the moment. See to it that he gets some rest before his next school day. I would like to talk with him without him being dead tired, in fact…” You said, then waved over Matt’s direction, to which he fell deeply asleep, then floated over to HER bed, and laid him in it, tucking him in comfortably. “He needs sleep now. Unlike us predators, HE needs sleep after days of being awake. Now, I would feel bad if he got in trouble over this. So, play nice, please.”

“Y-Yes… Sir…” She said, still comically hiding… well, comically to you. You were going to address her treatment of him, and his family, but knew that would only cause more problems and Matt was as capable as he was because of what he went through on a day to day basis. So, being your friend was probably the least intrusive way to better his life, for now.
